item.text: @#/ /rgyud 'bum wa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /A r+ya badzra a dzi ta a na la pra mo ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje mi 'pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ /bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri'i gangs
ri sul gyi mchog /ri rab kyi smad dang rked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhing re'ur bres pa 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa/ me tog
dri zhim po bkram zhing phye ma dang / bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa/ gdugs dang / a ga ru dang / phye ma dang / dril bu dang / bla res mdzes par byas
pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu

rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang /

sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur par 'dus te/ de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong dang / dge slong khri nyi stong lnga brgya dang

thabs cig go/ /bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston te/ gnas par bde ba/ mnyan na bde ba/ 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i chos ston to/ /de na lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams

dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / srin po'i bu rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams

dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to/ /bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sgra de dag gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye bzhin dag ci'i phyir ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / 'khrug pa'i sgra 'byin/ de dag gis gsol

ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dbang du bgyis te/ gnod pa dang drang bas bkug cing drangs te tho btsams na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros

dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa/ sa chen po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal tshab tu nye ste/ chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te/ rdo rje'i zo ma ltar dpung mgo yangs pa/ rdo

rje ltar mkhregs pa'i cod pan 'od zer 'tsher ba can/ rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa/ lus mkhregs shing sra ba dang / lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / lag na brtan po 'bar ba thogs pa/ rdo rje phur bu sra bas rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ mthu chen po g.yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri

dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun du snang bar byed cing rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / rdo rje'i be con dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i tog dang / rdo rje'i snang ba dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rin po che'i rdo rje dang / gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / 'khor lo rdo rje la sogs pa dang / rdo

rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang / dmag skyong rnams dang / sa skyong rnams dang / rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang / rdo rje'i yul rnams dang / rdo rje rnam par 'dren rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams

dang / rdo rje gnon po rnams dang / rdo rje rmi lam ngan byed rnams yang dag par skul/ rnam par skul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa thams cad la kun du snang bar byed/ rnam par snang bar byed/ gsal bar byed/ rnam par gsal bar byed/ rab tu dga' bar byed/ yang dag par

skul/ so sor skul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'chang khyod song la lha rnams

dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha'i lding rnams dang / nam mkha'i lding gi bu rnams dang / 'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam thag pa myong ba rnams

kyi bsam pa rdzogs par gyis shig /de nas rdo rje 'chang stan las langs te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / 'byung bo'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston cing rdo rje'i mtshon cha'i me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul

gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang / me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang / lce 'bebs pa'i glog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnams gzir te/ de nas bskal ba chen po lngar rmi lam dang / chu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i

grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang / gzi brjid dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ma dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba'i las grub pa'i rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje

de'i lag tu byin to/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab kyi chos ston par gyur pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / snying rje byed

pa/ rang gi rdo rje dang / rigs kyi rig pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bklags pa'i tshul du gyur pa drag po dang / dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha'i lding gdul dka' rnams 'dul ba ste/ de ltar de las byung ba'i bcom ldan

'das khro bo drag po rnams rmongs par byed pa/ sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa dang / sdang ba rnams skyod pa/ rmongs pa rnams 'jig pa/ dam po rnams rtsad nas 'don pa/ rgyas pa rnams sbur mar rlog pa/ yon po rnams srong ba/ gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed pa/ 'byung

po rnams skrag par byed pa/ srin po rnams sngangs par byed pa/ rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par byed pa/ gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'debs pa/ nus pa rnams ston par byed pa/ gsod par byed pa gsod pa/ gnod par byed pa phung bar byed pa/ de

der song nas lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de/ de ltar drag po ba drag po grub pa dang / khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug grub pa dang / lha ma yin pa lha ma yin grub pa dang / de dag spyir skul zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug /skyod par byed/ mthu ston par byed/ brjed par

byed/ rnam par skrag par byed do/ /stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje mi 'pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs gsung ba dang / gzungs 'di'i stobs dang / bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las

byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas/ 'od nges de rab tu dga' ste rdo rje las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis sa gsum gyi ston gyi skar ma dang / zla ba'i 'od zil du brlag par byas nas snang ba gcig pur byed cing rgya mtsho chen po ni skems/ ri'i rgyal po ri

rab ni g.yo bar byed/ glog gi 'khor lo dang / lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni bsgrags/ sgra drag po ni phyung / bsgyengs pa'i sgra ni bsgrags/ skrag par byas so/ /de na rdo rje mi 'pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzugs me lce 'od 'phro chen po khong na 'dug pa/ skra tshogs

gser dang rin po che 'dra ba/ rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yid las ches mgyogs pa'i thugs 'od 'phro zhing 'bar ba lta bur drag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po la skyabs su song ngo / /

de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa/ skal pa chen po dge ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems dang ldan ma/ 'di dag la lag cha dang mthun par bya ba'i stobs byin cig /de nas gzungs kyis smras pa/ 'di dag bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /

zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so/ /thor tshugs gsum ma/ sa gsum dang / dus gsum dang / drag po'i rtse gsum dang / khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / lus ngan gyi dbyug to dang / dbang po'i rdo rje dang / chu lha'i zhags pa

dang / log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rlung lha rnams kyi gzi dang / shugs dang / grub pa rnams kyi rmongs byed dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa dang / klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang / dug dang / khro bo dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin

po dang / mi'am ci dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / grul bum dang / bden bral dang / gnon po dang / ro langs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang / de bzhin du thams cad kyang sbyongs shig /mig gi 'dzums pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas

lag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul te smras pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ta thA ga ta sa mA d+hi d+hA ra NI/ ma hA a bar ta yi Sh+yA mi/ a hi badzre/ ku Ti le/ ku Ti bA kA ku la shi khi/ ka pi la ke

shi/ ta Ti tsi Ti ma Ta ni/ ka rka Ta mu Ti baT+Ti badzre/ ma hA bid+hu l+lo lo le/ bu gu pu lu/ su mu su mu/ sar sar/ phaT phaT/ su d+yo te/ piM ga le tsi te/ bi tsa Ti/ dz+wa la piM ga le/ sarba de ba ga Na/ pra ha ra Na mA yA/ sid+d+ha dA yi ke su ru ke/ su ru ke/ badzra g+ho Ne/ badzra dwi D+ha/ sA ra pra ha ra Ne

rat+na tra ya/ di kra la bud+d+he te/ badzra d+ha ra bi shwa sa ni ka /a pra ti ha ta pra marda ni swA hA/ gang gsang sngags 'di rjes su dran nas klog gam/ sgom mam/ 'dzin pa de thos nang na 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil

'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig dang phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa dang rjes su yi rang bas 'gugs par byed do/ /dug dang / gsang sngags dang / mdud pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs rnam par skrag

par byed do/ de nas lha dang / lha'i bu de dag gi de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam par rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma yang myong ba nas steng gi gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na

gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa'i sprin dang rin po che mang po'i char rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa snyan pas bstod de/ snyan cing zab la rnga sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de

skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rdo rje mi 'pham pa/ me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs

rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra sU k+Sh+ma a

pra ti ha tanA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs khro bo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

'das rdo rje rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u cig byung

ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rig pa'i bdag po/ gzungs kyi bdag po/ lha'i gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang / klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang / rig sngags

gzungs sngags rnams rab tu brjod du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so/ /na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+ca N+Ta badzra pA

Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA ba ta ye/ ta d+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ ba tsa ba tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya badzra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshan+da badzra/ b+hin+da b+hi n+da badzra/ hU~M phaT thA/ na ma sh+tsa N+Da badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu

lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT thA/ bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhig gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i cha bzung ste/ khro bo thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur

spros na/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang / tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te/ dgra dang / dug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas/ gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la rtsi ma gi ta sprin gyis bshig pa'am/ skyu ru ra rlon

pa gser gyis gzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing / rdo rje phra mo spros pas de dag gi phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du brlag par 'gyur ro/ /lhas smras na lha'i zla ba gcig gam/ lo ldan lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis smras

na/ bdud kyi mtshon cha rnams myur du btul bar 'gyur ro/ /mis brjod na gang la dmigs pa de mi'i zla ba gcig gam/ mi'i lo lnga na nges par brlag par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje dang / bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /de

nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad phyung ste/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gsum por bsgrags so/ /rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha badzra pA Ni hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/

'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam/ rus shes sam/ gsang sngags shes pa de la byad kyis mi tshugs so/ /

gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /srin po rnams dang / lhag ma za ba rnams dang / bdug pa za ba rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phyis 'jog pa rnams kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /ta d+ya thA/ u ki ri ma ki ri/ mi rI tsa pA sha pa ri/ u li me/ mi li me/ i

li me/ mi li me/ i li me/ mi li me/ i li ma li me/ hik+ke/ d+hik+ke/ huk+ke/ d+hu d+hu re/ pra d+ha re/ a laM pha le/ phA laM pha le/ khu khu me ti ku me tu me/ khi ri khi ri/ sA d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba bak+k+wa le/ ban d+ha ma bak+k+wa le/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po

lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par

bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob shig /'di lta ste rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gangs gnas dang / lngas rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang / grags pa bzang po dang / lus ngan gyi bus mdzes byed dang / phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po

chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid kyis log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang /

yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas gsol ba thob shig /gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra Ne swA hA/ de la lag na rdo rje bcu bo de dag

gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni 'di dag yin te/ tad+ya thA/ u ge te/ ke te/ sang ka te/ ung+du le/ d+ha d+he/ ta te/ ta pa t+te swA sA/ tsi tse tsi tse/ tsi khe lo ts+tshe da ni/ b+he da ni/ sar+b+ba bi d+yA ts+tshe da ni/ sarba gr-i ta/ kA kho rda/ pa ra kr-i ta nA sha ni/ de la rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje

bcu bo de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dam pa ni 'di rnams yin no/ /ta d+ya thA/ a le lak+She ba ke le lak+She/ a ke/ ba ke/ lak+She swA hA/ ta d+ya thA/ hu tu hu tu/ hu tu tu/ bi tu bi tu/ bi tu tu/ ga ts+tsha gats+tsha/ sap+te/ pa ta ha ta ye swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba to bu d+h+ya s+ya sid+d+h+ya n+tu man+t+ra man+t+ra pa rA swA hA/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzogs so// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ku N+Da l+ya mr-i ta hr-i da ya/ tsa tu r+tha nA ma d+hA ra NI/

bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la glang po che'i

lta stangs kyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di'i sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang / tshul la mi gnas pa dang / pha ma la ma gus pa dang / bsod nams chung ba dang / dad pa ma mchis pa dang / glags

tshol ba dang / rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang / rtag tu log 'dren dang / 'tshe ba can dang / sha za rnams kyis zin pa lags te/ bgegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhig pa dang / mthar gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni legs so legs so/ /khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags shod cig /de nas khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor

gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/ na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/ namash+tsaN+Da badzra bA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ pra dz+wa li ta dI b+ta daM Sh+To t+ka Ta/ b+ha ya b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ badzra bar+shu bA sha ha stA

ya/ ta d+ya thA/ oM hu lu hu lu/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ni/ kha kha kha kha/ kha na kha na/ khA da khA da/ khA hi khA hi/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ gr-i h+Na grah+Ni/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ gardza gardza/ ta rdza ta rdza/ pi s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ b+ha ga ba na/ a

mr-i ta ku N+Da'i/ mU r+d+hAn tA Ta ya badzre Na/ sarba bi g+h+na nI nA ya kA na/ ni pAr ya/ ma hAg NapatidzI pi tAn+ta/ ka rA ya hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ oM kro d+ha ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang po'o/ /na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+ca N+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo

ma hA badzra kro d+hA ya/ daMSh+T+rot+ka Ta/ b+hai ra pA ya/ a si baSh+Ta na ha stA ya/ he he/ pa ta pa ta/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ gaN pa ti dzI pi tA n+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags gnyis pa'o/ /na mo ra t+na

tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra bA na yo/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ pi ma la ka na ka dz+wa la b+hU Sha NA ya/ ga ga na a mr-i ta sam+b+ha bA ya/ rak+ta mA l+ya/ a nu le ba na pri yA ya/ badzra pA Ni pri yA ya/ badzra pA Ni pri yA ya/ badzra pA Ni tu l+ya/ be gA ya/ de ba/ nA ga/ yak+Sha/

ra k+Sha sa/ pra ma tha nA la/ trai lo kya go ca dA ya/ sha ta sai n+ya 'i dra ba na ka rA ya/ tri ra t+na ga r+b+ho t+ta mA ya/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da yi/ e h+ye hi daM Sh+To r+k+ka Ta/ b+hai ra b+hA ya ga gan pi d+yu da dz+wa la s+phu liM gA sha ni/ tu l+ya ru bo d+hi taM saM b+hu ta/ oM kha kha kha kha/ gr-i h+NA gr-i h+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha

na ha na/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dzA la pra dz+wa la/ gra sa gra sa/ sa rba big+h+na nA na'i ya kA nA nAM/ hr-i da yaM phaT/ gan+d+harba hr-i de yaM phaT/ rak+Sha hr-i da yaM phaT/ bra h+ma ra' k+Sha sa hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba dz+wa ra hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba tsA tu r+tha ka hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba nA gA nA na hr-i

da yaM phaT/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ A pi sha A pi sha/ i da ny+tsa me kA R+YaM ku ru badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA ha/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o/ /na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ daM Sh+To t+ka Ta/ bai ra bA ya/ ta d+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/

khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o/ /de nas 'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang bton pa dang / bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs na bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad bton cing legs par bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang / bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de bshad par 'tshal lo/ /

de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so/ /oM a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po'o/ /rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /log 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs med cing rten med par gyur

nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste bcom ldan 'das bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo bo thur du gtugs so/ /kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon

cig/ rdo rje kun du 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo shags sa re/ ngas ral pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang / gtubs pa dang / brdungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / skams

pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig /nga'i mthu dang brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig /gang 'di gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang / sgrub pa dang / de srung ba byed pa de la glags ma tshol cig /til sbrus pa'am/ zas ngan pa za yang rung

grong gi chos spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig /zan za ba'i tshe yang kham dang po sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod na de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang ngo / /log 'dren rnams kyang glags mi tshol lo/ /til

dang / sran chung dang / 'bras dang / spen tse yang rung / snum khur bar pa ta dang / la phug kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyang zar zin kyang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin na de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/ /'phags pa bdud rtsi

thab sbyor gyi snying po rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha b+hu ra kuM kU Ta rA dza sto tra man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM b+hur kuM

ma hA prA NA ya/ b+hu ra tsi hu ra ki ma nA se/ u tsu sma kro d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ phyag rgyal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal bstod/ khro la khros pas khro bo che/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sngar sangs rgyas/ /chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku/ /sme brtsegs zhes bya bdag phyag 'tshal/ /

bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar dbus na/ /pad ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/ /ljang nag chen po sme ba can/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ljang ba/ /spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i mche ba 'byin/ /mi gtsang bdud rtsi sman bzhin gsol/ /

g.yas pa rdo rje ral gri bsnams/ /g.yon pa zhags pa lcags kyu'o/ /tha ma sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsnol/ sme gtsang med pa'i las dag brtson/ /gdug pa sbrul gyis dbu lus brgyan/ /'jigs dang ngas med par brtul zhugs spyod/ /khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar mdzad/ /khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'jigs pa kun las skyob par mdzad/ /khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nad dang rims las bsrung bar mdzad/ /khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

mi gtsang zas dang mi gtsang gos/ /thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gdon/ /thams cad ma lus dga' bar mdzad/ /nad dang rims dang dal ka yams/ /bsrung ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag la bsrung ba mdzad du

gsol/ /mi gtsang ba rnams gtsang bar mdzad/ /sme ba rnams ni mi smer mdzad/ /lci ba rnams ni yang bar mdzad/ /dog pa yangs par mdzad la bstod/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs khyed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /gang dag khyed la mos rten

rnams/ /lus bde sems bde dbang po bde/ /bde ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus dag sems dag dbang po dag /dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus gtsang sems gtsang dbang po gtsang / /gtsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus dang sems dang dbang po dang / /

dang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus gsal sems gsal dbang po gsal/ /gsal ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha klu 'dre srin sogs/ /gnod sbyin 'byung pos 'di thos na/ /sdug bsngal zhi nas bde bar 'gyur/ /gangs rgyud bzhin du dkar bar 'gyur/ /

shel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur/ /me long bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dang bar 'gyur/ /sa dang mkha' la 'khod pa yi/ /lha klu la sogs sde brgyad kun/ /dge ba'i bsams pas 'khod 'gyur te/ /gzhan la ma gnod zhi bar mdzod/ /

khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ba la nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i

mdo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri btang bzung chen po na chos ston te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams

cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas pa yang de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gis sems can rnams dbugs 'byin cing / shar phyogs na me lce kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs

so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na stobs po che lag pa bzhi pa lag pa gcig na ni rnga yab thogs/ lag pa gcig gis ni phyag 'tshal/ g.yas na ni be con thogs/ g.yon pa na ni zhags pa thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ mig dmar ba/ de'i

'og na ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /g.yas na ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes so/ /g.yon na ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro/ /de nas snying po rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bur bzhag go/ /snying po ni ki li ki la dang / 'gro lding ba'i gzungs dang / /

lus dmar po dang / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa dang / rdo rje rgyan chen te snying po'i mchog go/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po drag po chen po dang / nye ba na ni 'phags pa mA ma kI'o/ /'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og na ni rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud do/ /sgo'i nang logs su ni khro

bo rdo rje'i tho ba dang / rdo rje'i be con gnyis mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/ /g.yon logs su ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni gos dkar mo'o/ /de'i 'og tu ni sgrol ma dang khro

gnyer can no/ /g.yon du ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo / /de bzhin du shar phyogs su ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / yul 'khor srung dang / dbang bo'o/ /me'i phyogs na ni me'i drang srong

chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /lho phyogs su ni gshin rje dang khyab 'jug go/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su ni srin mo'i bdag po ma mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /nub phyogs su ni klu'i bdag po klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung lha 'khor dang bcas

pa'o/ /byang phyogs su ni lus ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni dbang bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med grangs med

dpag tu med pa dag dang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mdo sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ki li ki li badzra/ ki li ki li ya swA hA/ spyi gtsug la swA hA/ dpral ba la swa hA/ mig la swA hA/ drag shul can la swA hA/ shin tu drag shul

can la swA hA/ rdo rje'i zhags pa la swA hA/ lus dmar po la swA hA/ lag na rdo rje la swA hA/ lag na zhags pa la swA hA/ lag na ral gri la swA hA/ lag na dgra sta la swA hA/ gzhu 'dzin la swA hA/ gtun shing 'dzin la swA hA/ lag na 'khor lo la swA hA/ lag

na mdung rtse gsum pa la swA hA/ snying po la swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/ drag po ki li ki la la swA hA/ byis pa ki li ki la la swA hA/ dmar po ki li ki la la swA hA/ stobs po che la swA hA/ ral pa can la swA hA/ gsus 'phyang bo la swA hA/ khro bo chol pa la

swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ srin po la swA hA/ srin po ya mun la swA hA/ drag po chen po la swA hA/ sprin la swA hA/ ri 'dzin la swA hA/ ri btang bzung 'dzin la swA hA/ rdo rje be con la swA hA/ lus 'jigs byed la swA hA/ sdigs

byed la swA hA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud la swA hA/ rdo rje'i gtan pa la swA hA/ rdo rje'i lus la swA hA/ 'gro lding ba la swA hA/ bdud rtsi la swA hA/ dka' thub 'dzin la swA hA/ lcags kyu la swA hA/ don yod la swA hA/ gtsug tor rgyal po la swA hA/ mdog dkar po la swA hA/ sngo bsangs

mdog la swA hA/ 'phyag bo la swA hA/ glang po che la swA hA/ ba glag 'phel gyi lag pa la swA hA/ bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la swA hA/ sbrul gyi ska rags can la swA hA/ rdo rje phur pa la swA hA/ lag pa gnyis ka la swA hA/ A rdo rje la swA hA/ 'bar ba'i 'od byed la swA hA/ blo

gros brtan pa'i rdo rje la swA hA/ myu gu la swA hA/ 'od byed la swA hA/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la swA hA/ rdo rje'i dra ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed la swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur la swA hA/ sprin rnam par 'thor ba la swA hA/ char pa rnam par rton pa la swA hA/ rdo rje lcags kyu la swA hA/ rdo

rje snying po la swA hA/ rdo rje nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/ mthe bo'i rgyal po la swA hA/ be con gyi rgyal po la swA hA/ go cha'i rgyal po la swA hA/ oM d+h+rI a~M/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM hu lu hu lu//

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM a mr-i te hU~M phaT swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/ mig mi bzang la swA hA/ 'phags skyes po la swA hA/ lus ngan po la swA hA/ dbang po la swA hA/ me lha la swA hA/ drang srong chen po thams cad la

swA hA/ nyi ma la swA hA/ zla ba la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swA hA/ srin po'i bdag po la swA hA/ klu'i bdag po la swA hA/ rlung la swU hA/ dbang bdag la swA hA/ dbang bdag gi chung ma la swA hA/ brgya byin la swA hA/ nor lha'i bu la swA hA/ rdo rje chen po

la swA hA/ tshangs pa chen po la swA hA/ sa ma swA hA/ dbyangs can la swA hA/ lha mo dpal la swA hA/ lha mo dka' thub zlog la swA hA/ rig sngags chen po stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'chang zhing yid la byed na srung ba dang / skyob pa

dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas brtan blo gros chen po sha ra dwa

ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta d+ya thA/

mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li/ d+hi ke/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma hA ka Ta/ sha ma sha ma sha ma/ ma hA sha ma/ shA tri shA tri shA tri/ shAn+ta shAn+ta shAn+ta/ da n+ta da n+ta da n+ta/ d+hI ra d+hI ra d+hI ra/ ma hA me g+ha du ra d+ha ra/ ha ri ha ri ha ri/ kuT+wi kuT+Ti kurbi/ ts+tshin+da

ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da b+hin+da/ sarba duSh+Tan/ gu mu gu mu gu mu/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ pra Na na dam ni dam ni/ Ta Ta Ta/ ThA ThA ThA/ DA DA DA/ DA DA DA/ tsa tsa tsa/ tsa tsa tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha da ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ sha ba ri sha ba ri sha ba

ri/ ma tang gi/ tsaN+Da li/ hu hu hu/ dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu/ ha ta pra t+yarli na/ tsi li tsi li tsi li/ phaT phaT phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tiSh+Tha tha tiSh+Tha tha tiSh+Tha tha/ mA ti kra mA tha/ ma tang gi/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he/ gal te mi 'dug na lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / kha

dang / mid pa dang / mig dang / snying dang / ngag thams cad bcing ngo / /da brog go/ /dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dun d+hu dun d+hu dun d+hu/ ban d+hu ban d+hu ban d+hu/ nI la nI la nI la/ nI lAng ga badzra d+ha ra/ stobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran par gyis shig /ko Ti ko Ti ko Ti

ni/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ badzra ma ni/ badzra d+ha ra/ badzra aT+Ta hAs/ tsa ra tu na ra tu mar tu/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ hu ru hu ru hu ru/ sems can chen po dran par gyis shig /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da tsaN+Na/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ hu rtu hu rtu hu rtu/ mu ru mu ru

mu ru/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ badzra pA Ni/ ha na ha na/ ma ma sarba sha tU NA na/ mUrti ni tA Da ya phaT/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ lag na rdo rje'i las dang 'gal bar ma byed cig /dam tshig las 'gal bar byas na dam tshig dral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bslus par

'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/ /tsu tsu tsu/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ phuT Tu phuT Tu phuT Tu/ ta pa ni ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pa tsa ni pa tsa ni pa tsa ni/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig /tsi li tsi li tsi

li/ phu lu phu lu phu lu/ phu phu phu/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi snying po 'di dang 'gal bar bgyis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa'i mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig /da ra phu/ tsa ra phu/ na ra phu/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /swA hA/ oM hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'od zer

kun du 'bar ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das nas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur par kun du snang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dang / bdud sdig

can ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams lag na thogs te bgegs kyi tshogs rnam par 'phrul ba du ma byed do/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa

chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba bzhugs pa der dong ngo / /de nas de ltar gyur pa dang / khro bo chol ba mdog dmar po/ sbrang rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/ mche ba gtsigs pas mi bzad pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brjes pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na be con thogs pa/

lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das shing de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang kun du snang ngo / /

de nas bdud sdig can dang / bgegs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya khro bo chol bas 'dar bar gyur to/ /bdud sdig can myos shing gzir te/ phongs nas srog la mi lta ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings so/ /de ltar gyur

pa dang / de'i tshe 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la ci nus kyis mchod nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ mngon par dga' bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lha dang

mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas/ don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che stobs chen po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di

dag smras so/ /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ bsti stang du byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod par byed na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur

ro/ /pha rol gyis byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad bshig pa dang / bcom pa dang / bsgyel bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba smras so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje

bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi d+ha n+da ya/ dza Ti laM bo da ra/

u ts+tshu Sh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan

dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ rim gror bgyid dam/ mchod par bgyid na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ stobs po che'i snying po 'dzin pa la ni gnod sbyin nam/ gnod

sbyin gyi bu'am/ srin po'am/ srin po'i bu'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum gyi bu'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding gi bu'am/ klu'am/ klu'i bu'am/ dri za'am/ dri za'i bu'am/ sha za'am/ sha za'i bu'am/ smyo byed dam/ smyo byed kyi

bu'am/ mkha' 'gro ma'am/ mkha' 'gro ma'i bu'am/ sgrub pa'am/ sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa dang / brjed byed dang / lus srul po dang / ro langs la sogs pa dang / gnon po'i gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad

kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid

do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang mdo sde 'di rab tu ston pa de mchod par bgyi ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang /

rim gror bgyi ba dang / bskor bar bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ lag na mdung rtse

gsum thogs pa drag shul can/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti rnA da/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ oM oM oM/ phaT phaT phaT/ stobs po che la swA hA/ oM rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ /ha na da ha pa tsa/ ma tha bi ki ra/ bi d+ha n+sa ya/ dza Ti laM bo da ra/ u ts+tshu Sh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/

oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba duSh+Ta na/ stam b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya/ du rA tsa rA na du Sh+Ta na ni bA ra ya/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ oM a nan+ta bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM d+h+r-i ka hU~M phaT/ oM shri ri/ shi ro mA li ni/ si ni si ni/ shi shi ni/ shi shi ni/ oM

sarba At+ma dza/ ma hA te dza badzra/ pA sha a nu/ pra pi sha/ sarba duSh+Tan/ stam b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya/ hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ oM a nan+ta/ bi dza ya/ ma hA tshaN+Te/ hU~M phaT/ oM phaT phaT phaT/ badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra karta ri ka ra ka ra/ ts+tshin+da

ts+tshin+da/ hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha/ ma hA ba la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M phaT/ oM bi pu ra/ rak+Sha badzra/ ba ny+dza ra hU~M phaT/ oM ki li ki li/ badzra badzri b+hur ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzri kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ A kar+Sha ya/ A kar+Sha/ hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ d+ha

ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra ya d+hA ra ya/ hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ dA ra ya/ dA ra ya/ pa Ta ya pa Ta ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ hU~MphaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ta Ta ta Ta/ ta Ta ya ta Ta ya/ hU~MphaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra

dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ di pya di pya/ dI pa ya dI ba ya/ hU~MphaT/ oM tsu ru tsu ru/ u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha/ shi kha ra ha ra ha ra/ hU~MphaT/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA tsaN+Da/ ha na nga ha pa tsa ma

tha bi ki ra/ bid+hA n+sa ya/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ ha na ha na/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi d+hA n+saya/ bi d+ha n+saya/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi bdag pos mchod pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa/ gzi brjid chen po/ su ru su ru/ mu

ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ g+hu ru g+ha ru/ ku rba ku rba/ ma hA ku rba/ bi ku rba/ ku na T+Ti/ na Ti na Ti/ shi ni shi ni/ khi ni khi ni/ ga kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ku ru ku ru/ tu Ta tu Ta/ tu T+Ta tu T+Ta/ tra T+Ta tra T+Ta/ ru ru tu ru/ 'byung po'i bdag po/ /klu'i bdag po/ /lha ma yin

gyi grong khyer rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ khro bo chol pa stobs po che/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru su ru/ hU~MphaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hri hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ oM tsu lu tsu lu ru swA hA/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/

sarba duSh+Tan/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM ha ha/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ oM bi sa ra/ sa na trA sa ya hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha ra ha ra/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hU~MphaT/ hU~M hU~M/

mA ma/ mA ma phaT/ oM d+h+r-i ka kro d+ha ni/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ oM ma hA ba la/ badzra d+ha ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ swA hA/ oM dz+wa la gra sa/ u ts+tshuSh+ma sA ga ra hU~M/ rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / yongs su srung

ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni dge bar 'gyur/ dug mi gnod par 'gyur/ shi ba sos par byed par 'gyur/ dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bu mang bar 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs kyang

gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa rnams la ni skyor chus 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dug thams cad kyang dug ma yin par byed par 'gyur/ mang la na gnas pa'i khye'u dang / bu mo

yang bde bar btsas par 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di zhag gsum bcangs na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun bcangs na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de

nas langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ stobs

dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ lag na rdo rje dga' ba/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / tshangs pa dang dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / ro langs dang / lus srul po 'jigs par byed pa/ smyo byed dang / skrod pa dang / gsod pa dang /

skems byed dang / sgo legs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang

ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag la 'byung po'i bdag po legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sngar te/ rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la

rnam par gzigs nas rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi dga' ba kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud thams cad kyi yul 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi

yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes sdam bag can du rdo rje

spar te/ de nas rdo rje pad+ma la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas/ rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chol pa lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa/ dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ khro bo chol pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma 'dar te gzir bar bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo / /de dag tshig nas smre zhing srog btang ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyam thag pa'i skad kyis ngus te/ byang

chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo chol pas gzir cing myos te/ phongs nas srog la

yang mi lta'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /mthu che ba'o/ /de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom

ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /mthu che ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas 'byung po'i bdag po la khro bo chol pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang

bcas pas smras pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na pa tsa ma tha bi d+hA na sa ya/ dza Ti laM bo da ra/ u ts+tshu Sh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ a A ma mA hA swA hA/ grogs po dag gang la la zhig khro bo stobs po che 'di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na de'i don thams cad 'grub par

'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la drag po'i las dang / nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la bgegs dang / mi dang / rnam par log 'dren gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye bo thams

cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /'dir zhugs na gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo thams cad kyi cho ga yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dir dbang bskur na bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam

par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo chen po lan khris sngar spyad pa byas te/ khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor byed pa/ byas pa gzo ba/ rgyud shes pa/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ gsum la skyabs su dong ba/ byang

chub kyi sems dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje can du gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ dbang bskur ba/ bla ma rnams kyi lung byin pa/ gang bdud thams cad dang / sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po

che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa de la bdud dang / dgra thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dang / sha za dang / lus srul po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / brjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la

sogs pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gsad pa dang bcing ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gcad pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rmugs byed dang /

rengs byed dang / rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs

'di dus gsum du 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ rjes su dran par byed na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lo nyes pa byung ba'i tshe/ stobs po che lan bdun bklags na/ sprin chen po las char 'bab bo/ /gal te char mi 'bab

na sprin gyi lha rnams kyi srog skam par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis sprin chen po las char 'bebs so/ /gal te char mi 'bebs na srog skam par 'gyur ro/ /gong du

smos pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs kyi cha'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam/ mtsho'i 'gram mam/ mchod rten gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tsan+dan dmar po dang / ka ra bI ra'i

me tog dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po la sogs pa dang / bum pa spos chus bkang ba la sogs pas mchod pa chen po byas te/ gang mdo sde 'di 'chang

ba dang / klog pa de g.yul ngo thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul

ngor song na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags gro ga la bris te spyi bor btags nas g.yul ngor mtshon cha rnams me tog bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdud des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu

'dug nas stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ci lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs po che zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos so/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phung po'o/ /stobs po che

zhes bya ba ni chos kyi tshul lo/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni lag na rdo rje'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /sangs

rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /dge bsnyen gyi yan lag gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bde dang thar dang mtho ris dang / /mkhas pa dag dang sems can ni/ /dam pa kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /stobs po

che ni gzung bar bgyi/ /de nas bdud sdig can chos la dga' zhing yid bde ba dang rangs par gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i mdo sde 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro

dang / dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar byed pa'o/ /de bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur lha'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa mtha' yas par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog par byed do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i snying po 'di ni gtsang sbra can nam/ gtsang sbra med pa'am/ smyung bar byas pa'am/ smyung bar ma byas pa'am/ 'khrig pa'i chos la sten pa la'ang 'grub par byed do/ /de la

bar chad du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas rab 'byor 'khor de nyid na 'dug par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig stsol ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje la dri ba dris

shig /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig sbyin par byed/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'bru sbyin par byed do/ /gos sbyin par byed do/ /dngul sbyin par byed do/ /gser sbyin par

byed do/ /ba lang sbyin par byed do/ /dam pa gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyin par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ spyi'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ sems can nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa rnams la ni 'bras bu'i

dus su gnas so/ /'bras bu'i dus kyi yon tan gyi don du gnas so/ /yon tan gyi don gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jog par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa

ste/ /stobs po che ni shes rab ldan/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs/ /spyi nas dbang bskur yid kyang gzhungs/ /mtshan dang yang dag ldan pa ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims shes rab che/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/ /dbang cher grags shing bsod

nams che/ /yon tan rtse mo stobs po che/ /mdo sde 'di la dbang bskur phyir/ /sangs rgyas brgyad stong der gshegs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes mdo sde 'di nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa spyi bor bzhag ste/ dge ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis

gzungs sngags 'di sa'am/ ri'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bcangs na 'jigs pa thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /su mdo sde

'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bro nad ma mchis par lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zung shig /chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar yang zung shig /don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya bar yang zung shig /sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung shig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya bar yang zung shig /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang

ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa

byas par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /shin tu zab pa'i chos bstan pa dang / cho

'phrul gyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi chos bstan pa gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i sems can rnams chu 'gram gyi shing ltar ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /spos

dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas mchod pa byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de la bar chad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di gnas gang yang rung ba na 'chang na lha

dang mir bcas pas mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che/ bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'ching ba yid la byed na sangs rgyas brgyad stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen

po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / dri zar bcas pa rnams dgyes dga'o/ /stobs po che'i gzungs sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus

par mi byed pa de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par byed pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yi

ge 'dri 'am/ chig mnyan na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ thub pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ shin tu phra ba/ shin tu zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sems can rnams kyi nang nas gang log par

sems pa de myos par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir mdo sde 'di bshad par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba dang /

dbang bskur ba dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / dpal gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir bshad

par bya'o/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad stong dang bar mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de/ thal mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so zhes mngon par dgyes par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas de dag la slar gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dag legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs po che'i gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo

rjes sdang ba bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi snying 'dar zhing 'gul bar mthong ngo / /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta d+ya thA/ oM ha na ha na badzra/

da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ka TaM ka Te/ dza ye/ bi dza ye/ a ba rA dzi te/ mA re sai n+ya/ pra mar da nA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo

rje bgegs dang rnam par log 'dren thams cad sngigs shig /chings shig /rnam par choms shig /ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig /grub pa rnams dul bar gyis shig /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'bab par gyis shig /lha dang /

klu thams cad tshur shog tshur shog /ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs

su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon

cig /'du byed thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni glog dang sprin dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni khyim dang dbu ba dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni mar me dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed

thams cad ni chu shing dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni ri mo'i rnam pa dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni me tog dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed 'di dag ni

bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi klung dang 'dra'o/ /'khrug par 'gyur bas rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o/ /skar ma dang 'dra'o/ /sems can rnams ni 'du byed 'di dag skye bar mi sems/ mi mthong / mi shes/ mi mjal gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gzigs so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa nyid kyis mjal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /'du byed thams cad ni stong pa nyid du mtshan nyid gcig par mkhyen to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen

to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan nyid 'di dag mthong zhing mtshan 'di nyid shes te/ spyod pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'

zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mdo

sde 'di mtshan nyid gang gis na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs

pa'i las rnams mdo sde 'dis byed par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di yongs su nub pa'i tshe/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su nub par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di 'tsho zhing sdod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'tsho zhing sdod de/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di nyid la phyag 'tshal te/

mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rangs nas bka' lung bzhin bgyi zhing / su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i gan du mchi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyang 'ong ngo / /lha thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /legs so legs so/ /bdag cag kyang dam pa stsal bar mngon par dga' ste/

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dam pa 'di nyid stsol ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stobs po che'i gsang ba'i snying po ni sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad sbyin par

byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis na mdo sde 'di chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i nyin mo ri btang bzung chen por mdo sde 'di nyid kyi chos bstan te/ mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas te/ mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rgyun du zhugs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa de la

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sras su 'du shes bskyed do/ /'khor de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par mdzad do/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba bgrod dkar sems can gyi/ /srid pa'i phur ba 'byin cing shes

rab kyis/ /srid phur sems klung 'joms shing thub pa yi/ /chos bstan pas ni sdig 'joms chos legs spyod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rjes legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ su mdo sde

'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pas bsod nams kyi phung po ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la

yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni ting nge 'dzin bye ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong phrag mang po mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro/ /bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/ /rim gror byed par 'gyur ro/ /mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman

dang / yo byad rnams kyang 'bul lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' la yang bde bar sbyar ba sgrub bo/ /dge 'dun gyi tshogs la yang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis chos bstan pa de la yang bsti stang du byas te nyan to/ /'dzin to/ /klog go/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ji lta ba dang /

mtshungs par stobs kyi pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ /stobs po che pha rol gnon pa'i khro bo 'di'i mthus bdag dang sems can thams cad/ swa sti swa sti/ sid d+hi sid d+hi swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'phags pa

byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi

khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang

ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lag na rdo rje yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra po d+hi dang / dzi nam tra dang / zhu
chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+da ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /Ar+ya badzra shri kha la s+ya tan+t+ra kalpa/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma

rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i rgyud kyi rtog pa/ dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dpal bskyed sdug bsngal sel byed cing / /sdang ba 'ching tshogs las grol ba'i/ /cho ga mdzes mas legs par nyon/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra dang

bral zhing / /dka' thub spyod pa rnam spangs nas/ /drag shul sems kyis gsang sngags 'di/ /brjod pa tsam gyis myur du 'grub/ /dad pa brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing / /bag yod snying rje cher ldan pa/ /des ni bla ma mi spong la/ /dpa' brtul shes rab des pa

che/ /'gro la byams sems cha ba des/ /sngags dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya sogs/ /brtsams pa tsam la dngos grub 'byung / /dad med le lo rnam 'tshe can/ /bla ma la ni mi gus shing / /shes rab zhan cing stobs chung la/ /bag med gzhan la gnod

sems bcas/ /dbang bskur gnang ba mtho ba na/ /des ni bskal pa stong phrag ni/ /bye ba du mar bsgrubs byas kyang / /'bras bu yod par mi 'gyur te/ /dper na byis pa blun po 'gas/ /'bras 'dod phub ma brdungs pa la/ /sha thang chad pa nyid las

ni/ /nam yang 'bras yod mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rgyal chen 'di/ /byin brlabs rnam mang 'byung ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan bde chen po/ /nges par 'grub pa zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs/ /rdo rje bla na med pa las/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di phyung ngo / /na mo b+ha ga wa t+yai/ badzra shr-iM kha le/ ha na ha na/ da ra da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+ha ny+tsa b+hany+tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ba sa ya ti ni/ rak+ta a k+ShI badzra g+ho Ni/ na mo b+ha ga wa t+yai/ badzra shr-iM kha la/ pU r+b+ba

di shi/ badzra brA kA re Na ban d+ha/ dak+Shi Na di shaM da N+ba prA kA re Na ban d+ha/ bash+tsi ma di shany+dza la brA kA re Na ban d+ha/ u t+ta ra di shaM sa ra prA kA re Na ban d+ha/ a g+ni di shaM a g+ni pra kA re Na ba na d+haH/ nai r-i t+ya di shaM/ kha D+ga prA kA re Na ban d+ha/ bA ya bya di shaM bA ta prU kA re Na ba na d+ha/ I

sha na di shaM tri shU laM prA kA re Na ban d+ha/ bA tA la di shaM nA ga pA she na ban d+ha/ u ra t+ha di shaM badzra shriM kha la prA kA ra Na ba na d+ha/ ur d+h+wa ba na d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ i daM badzra shr-iM khA la/ men+t+ra Na da sha di shaM ban d+ha/ ak+Sha rAk+Sha saM ban d+ha/ brat+ma rAk+Sha sA di naM ban d+ha/ d+hU ta

pre ta pi shA tsi ban d+ha/ gan d+harbaM ban d+ha/ gan d+harba ku laM ban d+ha/ sa na ta ku mA raM ban d+ha/ san ta ku mA raM b+hu ba naM ban d+ha/ bi d+yA d+ha raM ban d+ha/ mA kan shra ma Na maM ban d+ha/ nA ga shra ma NaM da r+sha naM/ man+t+ra d+ha/ sarba tI R+thi ka dar+sha naM ban d+ha/ siM ha byA g+h+raM ban d+ha/ yak+Shi NiM ban d+ha/

dA k+Sha saM/ g+hA ta na pa na d+ha/ ka Ta n+Ta ka ban d+ha/ khe tsa ri ban d+ha/ sha ku ni ma ban d+ha/ de paM ba na d+ha/ de bku ba laM ban d+ha/ nA gaM ba na d+ha/ a su raM ban d+ha/ a su ra ku laM ban d+ha/ ga ru Da ban d+ha/ ga ru Da ku laM ban d+ha/ bak+Shis ban d+ha/ bak+Shi ga NaM ban d+ha/

kin+na raM ban d+ha/ kin+na ra b+hu ba naM ban d+ha/ ma nu Sh+yaM ban d+ha/ ma nu Sh+yaM b+hu ba ban d+ha/ a ma nu Sh+ya ban d+ha/ a ma nu ShA b+hu ba naM ba na d+ha/ tsan+dA di t+ya b+hu ba naM ban d+ha/ sarba taM ban d+ha/ sarba ta ta laM ban d+ha/ brak+Sha ma ban d+ha/ br-ik+Sha ta laM ban d+ha/ swA ku laM ban d+ha/ bar ku laM ban d+ha/

man+tsha ka paM ban d+ha/ ma shA pa ba na daM ban d+ha/ ma ni mi t+yaM ban d+ha/ ni t+yaM ban d+ha/ sarba duSh+Ta satwaM ban d+ha/ badzra shri khA lA/ ma N+Te na ban d+ha/ ku b+hi ra~M ban d+ha/ sa su ma ka raM ban d+ha/ shri su ma raM ban d+ha/ dzA laM ban d+ha/ s+tha laM ban d+ha/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai badzra shr-i kha le/ hU~M hU~M

hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ sarba du Sh+TAM sarba ga bra t+yaM gaM ban d+ha/ twA da da sha b+hu dzI ye/ dwA da sha ne trA yi/ bi kI r+Sha ke shA yai/ tsaN+Da yai/ sa ha sra pra dz+wa li ta dI b+ha te yai/ u gra bi bi d+ha be sha d+ha ri NI/ ur d+ha ke shA yai/ tsa ba lA ye/ ta thA ga ta a pa ka ri sa twA nAM pa na d+ha/ i maM badzra shr-i khA lA/ man+t+re

Na/ bany+tsa sha ta/ yo dza na pa ri bi sha taM/ badzra shr-i kha len pan d+ha/ bar mu drA ts+tshin+da ye na ba leg laM ban d+ha/ u drA ya niM ban d+ha/ tsa tu ra DA ki naM ban d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ hu lu hu lu/ na maSh+tsa N+Da ma hA kro d+ha/ hu hu a mr-i ta hu hu ban d+ha/ a shI ti de bi ko Ti

ni yu ta sha ta sa ha sra ni badzra shr-iM kha la na ban d+ha/ tri ko na pr-i thi piM mur+d+ha ni badzre Na s+pho Ta ya/ tri swa ra gar mA ta bA tA la bA su ki twA Du ya ti/ bA taM ban d+ha/ me g+ha ban ng+ha/ sarba traM ban d+ha/ an+d+ra ban+d+ha/ in+d+raM ban d+ha/ in+d+ra b+hu ba naM ban d+ha/ ba naspa ti ban d+ha/ ba naspa ti de baM

ban d+ha/ e ka pA daM na d+ha/ dwi pA daM ban d+ha/ tri pA daM ban d+ha/ tsa tu sh+bA daM ban d+ha/ pa ny+tsa pA taM daM ba na d+ha/ sha taM bA daM ba na d+ha/ lak+Sha pA daM ba na d+ha/ sarba bi g+h+Na ba na d+ha/ sarba bi g+h+na ku la ba na d+ha/ bra h+ma ban+ha/ bra h+ma b+hu ba ni ba na d+ha/ pi Sh+Nu ban d+ha/ biSh+Du b+hu ba na ba na d+ha/ ma

he shwa raM/ ma hwe shwa ra bu ba naM ban d+ha/ ma he de baM ban d+ha/ ma hA de ba dza ta ba mA pA de na bi kra mi ban d+ha/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa t+yai badzra shr-iM kha le da sha di shaM badzra brA ka re Na ban d+ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ rig sngags 'di nyid gsungs tsam gyis/ /

rgya chen 'jig rten khams 'di rnams/ /rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur nas/ /lha dang lha min srin bcas dang / /gnod sbyin dri za grul bum dang / /mkha' lding lto 'phye lus srul po/ /klu dang mi 'am ci la sogs/ /tshogs rnams thams cad rmyos brgyal te/ /sa

steng kha sbub tu 'gyel nas/ /dbang po shin tu stor ba la/ /bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis/ /phog pa'i skad cig de ma thag /dran pa slar rnyed gzi mdangs skyes/ /de nas bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod/ /e ma'o bde ba che mchog dpal nyid las/ /rgyas pa stobs skyes

bkra shis kyis/ /lha mos hU~M brjod tsam nyid las/ /nam mkha'i khams su grags par 'gyur/ /bde chen ye shes mnga' bdag nyid/ /rdo rje zhes pa'i mtshan ldan pa'i/ /lha mo lu gu rgyud ma la/ /bdag cag rnams kyis gus par 'dud/ /sku yi 'od zer sna tshogs

kyis/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa'i/ /'od kyis bdag la bde ba skyes/ /lha mo bde ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /stong nyid smon byed mtshan ma bral/ /rgyal ba kun gyi rig pa las/ /ya mtshan lha mo'i rang bzhin thugs/ /mi rtog rang bzhin phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de rjes rgyal ba kun 'dus pa'i/ /gzugs sogs rig pa'i lha mo yis/ /'khor lo 'di la legs mchod nas/ /mgrin gcig tu ni 'dus nas su/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yis/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis stod par byed/ /rdo rje nam mkha' las

byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum/ /spros bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin gsal/ /rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gzugs kyi sgra yis ni/ /lha tshogs ma lus rnams 'ching mdzad/ /bdud rnams tshar gcod rdo rje sgra/ /nam mkha'i

gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro drug bdud 'joms zhal drug ma/ /phyi nang rten 'brel dag phyir phyag /sgeg cing cung zad 'jigs par byed/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad rdo rje lha mo la/ /lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ /rmad

byung bstod pa'i rgyal po des/ /bstod pa'i de ma thag tu ni/ /lha mo gzi mdangs cher skyes nas/ /rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra shr-iM khA le hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ rig pa gzungs kyi phreng ba'am/ /gsang sngags 'di nyid bshad tsam gyis/ /rims dang shu ba

g.yan pa dang / /lhog pa sha bkra mdze nad 'bras/ /klad nad mig nad rna nad dang / /lkog nad glo mchin nad rnams dang / /rgyu gzer snying nad mkhal nad dang / /rkang lag nad dang khyab par na/ /chu ser nad dang khrag nad dang / /bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dang / /shin

tu 'khrugs pa'i nad la sogs/ /yams nad thams cad zhi bar byed/ /gzhan yang 'byung po brjed byed gdon/ /sha za mkha' 'gro ma mo dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar log 'dren dang / /byad stems drag po phyi rol gyi/ /rig sngags gtum po la sogs pa/ /'jigs

pa'i gnod pa thams cad kun/ /rlung gis sprin bzhin gtor bar byed/ /gzhan yang stag gzig dom dred dang / /'phar ba spyang ki gung po che/ /sre mong byi ba sbrul byi la/ /sbrang bu mchu rings pa tre ka/ /khwa dang se'u byu'u rta la sogs/ /'jigs pa rnam mang ji snyed pa/ /

gsang sngags 'di brjod thos tsam gyis/ /thag ni skrod par byed/ /gnod pa rnam mang thams cad kyang / /sngags kyi sbyor bas sel bar byed/ /gnod byed rnams ni gnod med byed/ /gnod med gnod dang ldan byed cing / /sbyor ba yang ni sbyor ba 'gas/ /

gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ching bar byed/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa las gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas 'dir ni bshad bya ba/ /mdzes ma rdo rje khro mo yis/ /lha yi ting 'dzin sbyor ba rnams/ /thig le chen mos mnyan par gyis/ /oM badzra shriM khA

le/ /A t+mA rak+Sha rak+Sha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis ni bsrung ba dang / /tha mal rtog pa'i lus sbyong byed/ /snying gar zla steng hU~M yig gi/ /'od kyis rigs kyi gtso mo dang / /bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/ /mdun du legs par dmigs nas ni/ /snying ga

sa bon 'od rtse las/ /me tog sogs 'dzin lha mos mchod/ /gzugs sogs rdo rje ma rnams kyis/ /'dud cing so sor legs par mchod/ /thog ma med pa'i srid rgyud nas/ /lus ngag yid kyis spyad pa yi/ /sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun/ /bgyis rang bgyid

du stsal pa dang / /bgyid la rjes su yi rang pa/ /sdig pa'i tshogs rnams la lus kun/ /thams da so sor bshags par bgyi/ /slan chad mi bgyid sdom pa yang / /rgya chen bdag gis gzung bar bya/ /rgyal ba sras bcas mdzad pa dang / /'gro ba'i dge la rjes

yi rang / /rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rigs ldan rdo rje lha mo dang / /sngags rgyud rgya chen 'khor lo la/ /kun nas dang bas skyabs su mchi/ /mi rtog blo gros bskyed pa'i phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /gdul bya ji srid tshim pa ru/ /mya ngan

mi 'da' gsol ba 'debs/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /gdod nas ji srid da lta yi/ /bar du lus 'dis ci ma byas/ /da ni srid pa'i rlung rtogs nas/ /rang gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi/ /theg chen bla na med pa yi/ /lam

chen rgya mtsho gang yin pa/ /theg chen 'bras bu thob bar du/ /rgyun mi chad par bsten par bya/ /de ltar dad sems 'dun byas te/ /bsod nams rga chen rnams bsags pa'i/ /dge ba bla na med pa de/ /thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /dang po byams pa'i 'od

zer gyis/ /'gro rnams bde la dgod par bya/ /gnyis pa snying rje'i 'od zer gyis/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal 'bral sems bskyed/ /gsum pa dga' bas bde ba thob/ /bzhi pa chags bral btang snyoms so/ /de rjes rags pa'i stobs spong zhing / /bag chags

dri ma bsal nas kyang / /nam mkha' lta bur sgrub byed pa'i/ /de nas dag pa rjes dran bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAH sarba d+ha rmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+hohU~M/ de yis dag par byas nas ni/ /stong nyid rjes su bsgom par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba

At+ma ko \u0f85 haM/ dngos po thams cad ma lus par/ /nam mkha' lta bur bsgom par bya/ /der ni ra~M skyes nyi dkyil 'khor/ /dmar po 'od zer 'khrigs pa bsgom/ /de dbus hU~M yig sngon po yi/ /'od kyis 'gro ba'i bdud bsal te/ /slar yang yi ge la gzhug

par/ /rdo rje khro mo yongs su rdzogs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug me phung bzhugs/ /thugs kar nyi mar hU~M sngon bsam/ /'od kyis bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya/ /shar du rdo rje lhor da byug pa/ /nub tu chu ste byang du mda'/ /byang shar rtse gsum shar lho me/ /lho nub

ral gri nub byang rlung / /'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje brag /steng phyogs rdo rje rtse lnga'i gur/ /gsang sngags brjod pas bsgom par bya/ /hU~M las 'od zer rab spros pas/ /'khor lo bkod pa'i phyi rol du/ /rdo rje rtse gsum ra ba dang / /gur ni rab tu bsgom par bya/ /de rjes

rdo rje khro mo ni/ /zhu nas rang bzhin med par gyur/ /de las nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i/ /bdud bzhi mnan cing nyi zla ni/ /A li kA li las byung ba'o/ /bar du hU~M las rdo rje ni/ /khro mo'i rang bzhin 'od kyis bskor/ /khro mo dang bcas 'od zer rnams/ /rdo rje la

bzhugs sku bzhengs te/ /zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug gam/ /yang na zhabs bzhes bdud bzhi mnan/ /zhal kun sngo zhing khro gnyer can/ /dmar ser gyen skra thod phreng can/ /rdo rjes lus brgyan nam mkha'i mdog /bcu gnyis phyag ste g.yas pa na/ /rdo

rje zhags pa mda' gsor zhing / /sbrul dang dgra sta gri gug 'dzin/ /g.yon pa dril bu sdigs mdzub gzhu/ /dbyig pa rtse gsum tho ba'o/ /yang na phyag drug g.yas dang pos/ /rdo rje gnyis pas lcags sgrog ste/ /gsum pas mda' ni gsor bar

byed/ /g.yon gyi dang pos sdigs mdzub ste/ /gnyis pa sbrul gyi zhags pa'o/ /gsum pas gzhu ste 'gengs pa'i tshul/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma yi/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin la gnas na/ /yon tan kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /sngags kyi rtsa bar 'gyur ba'o/ /

sngags kyi bdag nyid yongs bskyed cing / /lha yi rang bzhin bsgrub pa yi/ /rin chen gzungs kyi phreng bas ni/ /chos rnams mtha' dag thob 'gyur te/ /ral gri mig sman ril bu dang / /rkang pa byug dang gter chen dang / /sa 'og 'gro dang bcud len

dang / /nam mkhar 'gro dang gser 'gyur dang / /de bzhin sa gzhan 'gro ba dang / /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod/ /rmongs dang rengs dang bskrad pa dang / /dbye dang dgug dang rig sngags 'ching / /bsrung dang phyir bzlog chen po dang / /zha dang lkugs

dang sems brgyal dang / /long dang sna tshogs nad skyed pa'i/ /sbyor ba rgya chen 'grub pa dang / /mngon shes drug po yongs skye zhing / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /phyag rgya chen po thob 'gyur na/ /ltas mthong tsam la sogs pa yi/ /dngos grub phra mo smos ci

dgos/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba bskyed pa'i lha/ /dmigs pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa yi/ /hU~M las skyes pa'i lha mo ni/ /sngon mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma/ /g.yas pa ser zhing g.yon pa dmar/ /spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can/ /dmar ser gyen skra thod pas

brgyan/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis spras shing 'gying / /thod pa'i phreng can klu yis brgyan/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum ro la brdzis/ /phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na/ /rdo rje gnyis pas gri gug ste/ /gsum pa sbrul gyi zhags pa 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi dang po

sdigs mdzub ste/ /gnyis pas thod pa gsum pa na/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dkar po'o/ /yang na zhal kun sngo bsangs nyid/ /'dis ni 'ching dang dbang gi las/ /mtha' dag rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /srid par bram za skyes lha mo/ /sngon mo zhal gcig phyag

gnyis ma/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon lcags sgrog /gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan ldan pa/ /bsad pa'i las rnams thams cad ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'dis bsgrub/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /chos rnams thams cad 'byung byed cing / /dngos
