yi glags mthong nas nas ni phung bar byed/ /ba sgrub pa kun la dang po kho nar ni/ /lha bshos gtor ma phal cher dbul bar bya/ /sngags pa'i las grub nas kyang dus kun du/ /rang gi nyams kyis ci snyed dbul bar bya/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha'

lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad g.yog 'khor tshogs dang bcas rnams la/ /bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis/ /

gnas nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang / /rin chen

gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang / /mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang / /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa'am/ /khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang / /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag gam/ /dka'

thub gnas sam glang chen bres dag gam/ /rgyal po'i da kor khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang 'dun sa dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig dang / /dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chan po dang / /seng ge dred dang ga can gzan gnas dag

dang / /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang / /gang dag gling mchog rnams na gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su/ /phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / /bstod dang gtor ma mar me

gus 'bul ba/ /'di dag bzhes nas btung zhing bsnams nas su/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas su/ /de nas phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa bya/ /dbang bdag 'byung po'i bdag por bcas pa yis/ /gtor ma phul

ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje srin po chu bdag dang / /rlung dang lus ngan 'byung po gdon dang bcas/ /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang / /ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la/ /so so so sor

gtor ma phul ba rnams/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang / /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / /nang mi dpung bcas dmag dang thabs cig tu/ /me tog dri dang gtor ma byug par bcas/ /

'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang / /bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba la/ /gtor ma gtong ba'i las rnams byed pa de'i/ /dngos grub myur zhing shin tu bgegs kyang med/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod

pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa dbung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o// //gang zhig dgra bcom pha ma gsod pa dang / /mthun pa'i dge 'dun dbyen ni byed pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs la sdang ba'i sems kyis su/ /nam zhig mi dag sku

mtshal 'byin byed pa/ /shin tu mi bzad pa yi las 'di rnams/ /rgyal bas mtshams med lnga po yin par ba shad/ /gti mug can gyis sdig pa gcig byas kyang / /phung po 'di la grub pa thob mi 'gyur/ /mchod rten 'jig cing byang chub sems dpa' gsod/ /nyon

mongs zad pa'i ma ni sun 'byin dang / /slob pa gsod cing dge 'dun mnga' ba la/ /gang zhig 'dod pas mang nyung rku 'phrog pa/ /mtshams med nye lngar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /tshul nyams mi ni gang zhig 'di byed pa/ /bskal pa'i bar du mnar

med sdug bsngal myong / /gsang sngags dngos grub bsgrims kyang yong mi thob/ /gang zhig bde gshegs gsung gi glegs bam dag /chud gson pa dang mes ni sreg pa dang / /bsam pa ngan pas chur ni 'dor ba dang / /yang na chos kyi sku ni spong ba'am/ /bslab tshig ma lus

pas ni brgyan pa yi/ /dge slong dag gam dge slong ma gsod dang / /dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma gsod dang / /ngan pa'i sems kyis lha khang bsregs kyang rung / /mi yi yul na sdig pa 'di byas pa/ /dka' ba spyod par ldan yang grub mi thob/ /gang zhig dkon mchog

gsum la gnod pa yi/ /bsam pas gnod pa cung zad byas kyang rung / /bdag nyid ngan pas dmyal bar ba cos par 'gyur/ /de nas shi nas las kyi dbang gis yang / /rigs ngan mi yi nang du skye ba 'thob/ /'di dag ngas ni khyod la mdor bshad do/ /gang zhig byang chub

sems ni blangs pa las/ /rmongs pas 'jig rten lha tshogs phyag byas na/ /de dag de la mi dgar gyur nas su/ /de yi gsang sngags dngos grub nyams par byed/ /gang gi tshe na sems ni dang ba yis/ /mi yi yul na byang chub sems blangs pas/ /de ni phyin cad lha dang lha

min dang / /'jig rten ma lus rnams kyis phyag byar 'os/ /mis ni mngon par mtho ba ma lus pa'i/ /bslab pa mtha' dag blangs par gyur pa dang / /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum gyi rgyud du snying nas skyes/ /gang zhig mi bzad las byed

thub pa gsod/ /rig sngags gcod dam gnod par byed pa'am/ /bsam pa ngan pas gsang sngags tshogs mi mchod/ /don med bzhin du sen mos rtswa gcod dang / /rkang pas rkang pa nyed par byed pa dang / /phyugs la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi sna 'bugs dang / /'phags pa'i

dge 'dun la ni mi gus pa/ /'byung por byin pa'am lha yi gtor ma 'am/ /sa la lhung ba sngags pas bza' mi bya/ /'dod chags zil gyis gnon pa'i dud 'gro dang / /bud med bgrod bya min par 'gro mi bya/ /glang chen mi gdul sbrul yang mi gzung zhing / /rta rgyug glo

rdebs lcag gis gzhu mi bya/ /las de rnams dang ldan par gyur pa de'i/ /dngos grub nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can nad kyis gdungs dang sdug bsngal la/ /rtag tu byams pa yang ni yid la bya/ /dper na nam mkha' mtha' thug med pa la/ /'dom gyis

gzhal bas mtha' rtogs mi nus ltar/ /de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la brten nas ni/ /phan dang gnod pa byas pa'i mtha' mi rtogs/ /rgya dang rnyi dang bong rgya 'dzol bu yis/ /khyi la sogs pas sems can gsod pa dang / /bya rog la sogs gzeb kyis bcing byas na/ /

'di dang pha rol du yang grub mi thob/ /bdud dgra'i me tog rnying pa bor ba rnams/ /rkang pas mi rdzi mgo la gdags mi bya/ /bkres pas gdungs kyang de dag rnams la ni/ /phul ba'i lha bshos rnams kyang bza' mi bya/ /'jigs kyang tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug dang / /

drag po rlung la sogs la phyag mi bya/ /de yis bshad pa'i chos la bsten mi bya/ /de dag dka' thub mi spyad rtags mi mchod/ /de rnams chos la'ang ngan sems mi bya zhing / /de yi spyod la nams kyang dga' mi bya/ /de dag bstod pa mi gdon sngags mi bzlas/ /sbyin pa byin tshe

snying rje bskyed nas sbyin/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis brten pa yi/ /gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phyag bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams/ /de dag rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas yin no/ /ji ltar zla ba tshes la mi rnams ni/ /phyag 'tshal nya la

lus can phyag mi 'tshal/ /de bzhin dad pas rgyal ba'i thugs sras la/ /phyag bya'i de ltar bde bar gshegs la min/ /'jig rten kun gyi mngon mthong bslab pa can/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i don du ni/ /skye ba len pa de la ci yi phyir/ /bu gcig bdag nyid kun der

phyag mi bya/ /skyes bu bsam yas rmad byung rdzu 'phrul can/ /de la mi ngan gang zhig mi 'dud pa/ /de la rgyal ba thams cad thugs nur nas/ /de yi gsang sngags dngos grub mi stsol lo/ /dper na shing gi me tog dang por ni/ /yid 'ong phyi nas 'bras

bur gyur pa ltar/ /sems can mchog rnams me tog 'dra bar ltos/ /'bras bu bzhin du rgyal ba rig par gyis/ /gang zhig rang bzhin chags dang rnam bral yang / /brtse la snying rje khro la khro ba dang / /'dod chags can la chags can ltar ston pa/ /byang chub tshul gnas

de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yis/ /'gro ba kun dang ci ltar mthun pa yi/ /gsang sngags gzugs kyi rjes su 'jug mdzad pa/ /sngags kyi rnam 'dren de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa dbung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u dgu pa'o// //

lha dang lha min mi la phan gdags phyir/ /gsang sngags rig sngags sna tshogs dang / /'bum phrag lnga dang bye ba phrag gsum dag /rig 'dzin sde snod bshad par rgyal bas gsungs/ /ngas ni gsang ba pa rnams gzhom pa dang / /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar bya

ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bcas shing phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/ /gsang sngags bye ba phrag bdun rab tu bshad/ /pho nya bcu dang rig pa'i rgyal po bdun/ /de bzhin phyag brnyan drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / /nga yi snying po dam pa brgyad rnams dang / /khro bo drag po bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / /rig

pa mchog la sogs pa mthu bo che/ /rig pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rjes 'brang bcas/ /de snyed rdo rje'i rigs ni gang yin pa/ /der ni 'di dag nga yis rgya cher bshad/ /spyan ras gzigs kyis gsang sngags bye ba phrag /gsum dang de bzhin 'bum phrag lnga rnams bshad/ /de

yi rig sngags bdag po rta mgrin dang / /de yi ming can dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs/ /bcu gnyis phyag dang phyag drug pa dang ni/ /thor tshugs cod pan 'dod pa 'byor byed dang / /zhal bzhi don yod zhags par bdun bstan 'di/ /sa steng gsang sngags nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar/ /

de rnams rta mgrin dkyil 'khor gsang sngags te/ /mi la mchog sbyin 'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud/ /sgral ma dkar mo gos dkar spyan ma dang / /rnam gzigs ral pa gcig ma dkar sham dang / /grags ldan khro gnyer can dang 'di dag rnams/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi rig

sngags rgyal mo mchog /de dag dkyil 'khor sna tshogs gzugs can dang / /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ /rgyas pa'i gsang sngags rgyud du 'og pag can/ /rig pa'i dbang phyug gsang sngags bdag por bsgom/ /de ya gsang sngags mi la grub mchog ster/ /

de la lngas rtsen yang ni mngon par dga'/ /gnod sbyin dbang phyug de dag rtag mthun pas/ /de yi bka' yis gsang sngags tshogs rnams bshad/ /lngas rtsen gyis ni stong phrag nyi shu ste/ /de yi chung mas de yi phyed bshad do/ /nor gyi bdag pos stong phrag sum cu ste/ /

gang po pha yis kyang ni 'bum bshad do/ /lha dang lha min la sogs rgyal ba la/ /dad pa rnams kyis gsang sngags mtha' yas bshad/ /kha cig nga yi rigs su gtogs pa ste/ /kha cig kyang ni pad+mo'i rigs su gtogs/ /kha cig nor gyi rigs su gtogs pa yin/ /gzhan

yang kha cig gnas med rnam par 'khyam/ /nor spyod ces bya nor gyi rigs su gsungs/ /nga ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes rab tu bstan/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i rigs yin te/ /rigs bzhi pa ni 'dir yang lngas rtsen yin/ /gsang sngags mdo sder ngas bshad gang yin te/ /bzhi po

'dir ni rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /gzhan yang 'di na kha cig gnas med par/ /bde bar gshegs la brten cing yongs 'khyam pa/ /mdo sde 'dir ni de dag thams cad kyang / /'byor pa 'dod pa'i mis ni rnam par sbyar/ /lam 'di nyid du zhugs pa'i sngags pas ni/ /yid dang

mthun pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /srid gsum nang na rgyal ba dkon mchog ste/ /de yi 'og tu de las byung ba'i chos/ /de yi dge 'dun skyes chen brgyad po ste/ /srid pa gsum na dkon mchog gsum po gtso/ /'di gsum bsod nams rnam 'phel rgyu yin pas/ /dngos

grub 'dod pas gsang sngags mgo la gdon/ /bsod nams ched dang log 'dren rmongs bya'i phyir/ /phyag na rdo rje gtum mchog phyag 'tshal zhes/ /gsang sngags rnams kyi mgo la sbyar bya bar/ /gnod sbyin mgon po ngas ni bshad pa yin/ /nor

gyi rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs la yang / /rang gi gsang sngags bdag por ldan par bya/ /bde bar gshegs min nyan thos lam zhugs dang / /rang rgyal rnams kyi lam la gnas pa dang / /dad pa med cing tshul 'chos 'jungs pa yis/ /nga yi rdo rje nam yang bcang mi bya/ /gang zhig theg

pa mchog la sdang ba dang / /bdud kyis bshad pa yin zhes zer ba dang / /rmongs pa nga la gnod sbyin zhes smra dang / /byang chub sems dpa' la ni mi 'dud pa'i/ /dge slong dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang / /dge bsnyen ma dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyis/ /nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags

bzlas brjod na/ /de dag rnams kyi lus ni myur du 'jig /gang zhig nga rigs rjes su 'brang ba'i gdon/ /'byung po gnod sbyin klu dang sha za yis/ /nga yi sngags brjod rdo rje thogs pa dag /mthong na khros nas phung bar byed par 'gyur/ /gang zhig theg mchog rgya chen klog pa dang / /

de la dad cing de nyid 'chad par spro/ /brtson 'grus che zhing byang chub sems brtan pa/ /de la nga yi gsang sngags mchog sbyin mdzad/ /ngas ni 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas pa'i/ /gsang sngags yangs shing rgyas par bshad pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten pa bsdus nas/ /

zhar la bshad pa 'di dag khyod kyis nyon/ /drag po yis ni bye ba phrag bcu bshad/ /nor lha'i bus ni stong phrag sum cu ste/ /tshangs pa yis ni stong phrag drug cu nyid/ /nyi mas kyang ni 'bum phrag gsum bshad do/ /nam mkha' lding gis stong phrag brgyad de/ /gtum byed mas

ni stong phrag brgyad bshad do/ /me yis kyang ni brgya phrag bdun nyid de/ /phur bu gsum pa yas ni stong bshad do/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis lnga stong ste/ /mtshan mo rgyu dbang stong phrag bcu gnyis bshad/ /'gro la phan phyir 'jig rten bdag po bzhis/ /'bum phrag bzhi ni

rab tu bshad pa yin/ /lha min dbang pos 'bum phrag gnyis nyid de/ /lha yi dbang pos kyang ni 'bum phrag gsum/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya sna tshogs cho gar ldan/ /so so'i gzhung gi dkyil 'khor rnams dang bcas/ /rang sngags mdo sde'i rjes 'brang dad bskyed na/ /ma bsgrims bzhin

du the tshom med par 'grub/ /de las bzlog na dngos grub mi thob la/ /sdug bsngal mang po yang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa dbung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// //bcud kyis len dang gter dang phug 'gro dang / /nor bsgyur 'byung khung sngags dang gser

bsgyur rtsi/ /rin thang med pa'i rin chen nor sbyin te/ /brgyad po bstan pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /sngags dang phug tu 'gro dang bcud kyis len/ /sdig pa spong bar byed pas mchog tu bstan/ /rin chen dang ni gter dang 'byung khung 'bring / /gser bsgyur rtsi dang nor bsgyur

tha ma'o/ /mi ni sems stobs ldan zhing chos la brtson/ /dka' thub kyis phyug dang por bstan pa'i snod/ /rdul shas che ba la ni 'bring por gsungs/ /tha ma la ni mun pa can gyis bsten/ /gang zhig mchog tu bstan pa bsten 'dod pa/ /des ni tha mar bstan pa rnam par spang / /

gal te nor la sred cing sdug bsngal gyis/ /gdungs na 'bring po la ni bsten par bya/ /lha yi bde ba dang ni 'byor pa dang / /tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / /thos mang mdangs bzang gcig tu yid gzhungs dang / /dbang che kun dka' thub stobs kyis 'thob/ /chags

la rnam bral dge la dga' ba dang / /rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sems gzhol dang / /sdig pa spangs shing bzlas brjod ldan pa yi/ /mi la lha rdzas dngos grub ring ba med/ /rdo rje mtshon me gnam lcags mthu 'dra ba'i/ /gsang sngags mi yi 'jig rten mchog sbyin mdzad/ /'jig rten

'di dang pha rol nyid na yang / /sdug bsngal sel cing sdig 'joms gzhan med do/ /gang zhig dpag bsam ljon pa'i shing lta bur/ /la lar dngos grub la lar bsod nams dang / /gzhan la gzugs stobs che dang bde ba dag /yid mthun 'bras bu 'dod pa'i mi la stsol/ /gsang

sngags sna tshogs gzugs su rnam sprul nas/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal gang zhig 'jigs skrag pa'am/ /rgyal po chom rkun thog gis 'jigs skrag pa'i/ /'gro ba'i tshogs chen mtha' dag skyob par mdzad/ /gang zhig yul dang khyim la bsten kyang rung / /

dka' thub mnyams rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /nyin gcig bzhin du cung zad sngags bzlas na/ /de yi gsang sngags dus shig na ni 'grub/ /cho ga bzhin du dang po 'bum bzlas nas/ /de nas sngags pa bsgrub la 'jug par bya/ /des na dngos grub myur du 'thob 'gyur

la/ /gsang sngags cho gas yun ring nyon mi mongs/ /lus la sa yis dril phyis byas nas su/ /chu chen rnyog pa med par zhugs nas su/ /ci tsam 'dod pa'i bar du khrus byas te/ /byung nas shar ram byang du kha bltas nas/ /chu yis lag pa rkang pa bkrus nas su/ /pus mo phyi rol du

ni bstan byas te/ /bar du lag bzhag tsog tsog por 'dug nas/ /sgra med dbu ba med pas nye reg bya/ /lan gsum bar du chu ni 'thungs nas kyang / /mchu la lan gnyis yongs su phyi bar bya/ /so la chags pa lce yis reg pa dang / /sbrid pa byung na kha yang bkru bar bya/ /rab byung skyes

pa bud med gzhon nu dang / /gzhon nu ma dang rgan po bram ze rnams/ /de la nam yang sngags pas reg mi bya/ /sngags pas de dag rnams la mi bsam mo/ /brgya la de dag rnams kyis reg gyur tam/ /sgrub pos de dag rnams la reg gyur na/ /slar yang khrus dang 'thor 'thung

byas nas su/ /de nas phyir yang bzlas la 'jug par bya/ /gtsang sbra la dang zlos dga' snying rje can/ /rtag tu len pa las ni log pa dang / /slong mo'i zas za lha yi las brtson pa/ /de yi lus la gsang sngags 'jug par 'gyur/ /'ga' yis bud mid gos dang nor rnams

dang / /bzhon pa rgyan dang byug pa bza' btung dang / /mal stan rnams ni mang nyung byin gyur na/ /de la bsgrub la gnas pas mi blang ngo / /sa phung bshang sgor lnga ste mtshan la gsum/ /g.yon la gsum ste lag pa gnyis la bdun/ /yang na sa dang chu yis ci srid du/ /dri ma dri bral de srid

bar du bya/ /sos ka nags me mched pa'i me lce yis/ /ma bsgrims bzhin du tshang tshing kun bsregs ltar/ /bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa sreg /ji ltar gangs la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /gdungs na bzi brjid

mi bzod 'ju ba bzhin/ /tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlas brjod kyis/ /gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang zad par 'gyur/ /mun nag dmag la mar me phyung ba yis/ /mun nag ma lus sel bar byed pa ltar/ /tshe rabs stong nas bsags pa'i sdig pa'i mun/ /bzlas brjod

mar mes myur du sel bar byed/ /ci ste bzlas brjod pa ni sbyin sreg gis/ /gsang sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob na/ /'jim pa las ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa'am/ /yang na chu 'gram bye ma la yang gdab/ /des ni de yi sdig pa srid gzhan la/ /byas pa gang

yin de ni zad gyur na/ /des ni gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid du/ /mthong ba'i chos la gsang sngags 'bras bu 'thob/ /sngags kyi rtsa ba dang po tshul khrims te/ /de nas brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa dang / /rgyal ba la ni dad dang byang chub sems/ /gsang sngags dang ni le lo

med pa'o/ /ci ltar mi dbang yan lag bdun ldan pa/ /skyo ba med par skye dgu 'dul bar byed/ /de bzhin sngags pa'ang yan lag 'di bdun dang / /ldan na dngos grub dam pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /dang po bzlas brjod phal cher byas nas su/ /de yi 'og tu 'dir ni sbyin sreg bya/ /

sbyin sreg dag gis gsang sngags mchog myur s+col/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang sbyin pa mdzad/ /gang gis dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol nas/ /gsang sngags mthu yis bud med bkug kyang ni/ /bud med ma yin gnod sbyin bu mo ste/ /de gzugs cha byad kyis ni sngags pa bstan/ /

'dod pa'i don phyir bsgrub pa gang yin de/ /grub na'ang gnod sbyin bu mos sbyin par byed/ /de ni bud med de ya lus su yang / /sprul nas mtshan mo 'dod pa bsten par byed/ /ci ltar mi dag 'dod phyir bud med la/ /bsten phyir mi yi nor ni zad 'gyur ltar/ /de bzhin gnod sbyin

mo'am bran mo dag /gsang sngags mthus bkug bsten par byed pa'o/ /gzhan gyi chung mar yid la bzhag nas su/ /gang zhig de la 'dod gdungs bsten byed pa/ /mi shes yid kyis gzhan gyi chung ma la/ /'dod pa spyad pas sdig pa mang po 'thob/ /

rgyal ba la dad gzhan la phan brtson pa'i/ /lha klu lha min gnod sbyin dri za dang / /grub par bcas pa sngags bshad gang yin pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /ma 'ongs sems can mgon skyabs

med rnams la/ /rab tu gzigs nas byin gyis brlab pa mdzad/ /de dag 'bras bu rab dang 'bring dang ni/ /tha mar dbye bas rnam pa gsum du bstan/ /mkha' la 'gro dang dpal gyi phug tu 'jug /'dod dgu'i gzugs can mi snang rnam pa dang / /gnod sbyin bu mo'i khyo dang

bcud kyis len/ /mig 'phrul sgyu ma mtshan mo rgyu ba ste/ /de dag mchog yin 'bring ni sa bdag go/ /grong dang nor dang dbye dang dgug pa dang / /dgar dang bskrad pa dang ni gsad pa dang / /klu yi gdon gyis zin pa gso ba dang / /gang yang 'di lta bu dang mthun pa'i las/ /de ni mkhas

pas phran tshegs yin par bstan/ /bye brag tu ni klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /byis pa gdon gyis zin dang gang dag tu/ /lus can rnams la ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag /ston par byed pa phra mo'i phran tshegs yin/ /byab dang khu tshur thal lcag skra drang dang / /rna bar bzlas dang dbab dang bskrad

pa dang / /gsad dang bcing la sogs pas tshar gcad dang / /bod dang rig pa'i gos dang sngags gos dang / /rdog pas bsnun dang rnam par bskyod pa dang / /mig tu dug song ltar ni gzhug pa dang / /khab kyi gzugs dang khab cing skyug tu gzhug / phu zhes bud dang yan lag

gzhig pa dang / /brang gis 'gro bdag kyang dgug pa dang / /phyir yang bcing dang mnan par bya ba dang / /rmongs dang byad dang dug zar gzhug pa dang / /dug ni gzhan la spo bar bya ba dang / /lcags kyur ldan pas drang bar bya ba 'am/ /lus la zhen pa'i dug ni bslang ba'am/ /zos

par bza' dang zos pa bcad pa dang / /sa bcing ba dang pho nya gtang ba dang / /bskrad pa dang ni klu la bstan pa dang / /dung dang rdza rnga'i sgras ni bslang ba ste/ /rnam pa 'di dag dug gi rgyud du bshad/ /sa yi steng na sbrul ni brgyad cu dag /gzhan la gnod par byed cing rnam par

'khyam/ /de dag rnams las nyi shu gdengs ka can/ /'khyil pa drug dang dug med bcu gnyis dang / /de bzhin sbrul ni khro bo bcu gsum ste/ /sum cu gang yin rigs de'i nang du gtogs/ /sbal pa'i mgo dang sdig pa kha brgyad dang / /rnam par dbye na rab tu mang po yod/ /

gcin rtug kha chu reg dang mthong ba dang / /mche ba btsugs pa las ni dug kyang gtong / /de las dug gi rgyud la mkhas pa yis/ /rab 'bring tha ma gsum du rnam par da bye/ /dug mod khra ba'i dbang bsgyur skrag pa dang / /de bzhin sngangs pa'am bkres pa'i zas phyir ram/ /

sha khon yod pa'am gshin rjes bstan pa'am/ /lus la brdzis na de dag za bar byed/ /zos pa de yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ /mche bas zin dang sos bcad btab pa'o/ /gang du mche ba gcig gis khrag phyung rjes/ /de ni dug chung pas ni zin par bshad/ /gang du mche ba

gnyis kyis btab nas su/ /khrag dag byung bar gyur pa zos pa'o/ /gal te mche ba gsum gyis sha bcad na/ /de ni bcad par gyur pa yin zhes bstan/ /gang du mche ba bzhi yas btab nas su/ /sbrul gyis lus ni zos par gyur pa de/ /btab nas zas pa yin zhes bshad

pa ste/ /de ni sman rnams kyis kyang bzlog par dka'/ /me ya rang bzhin gnad rnams 'dra la ba'i dug /mtshon dang me dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa dang / /ji ltar sngags kyis rab tu zhi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar sman pas sbyor bas mi nus so/ /ci ltar me phung chen pos bud shing la/ /

nges par bsregs la chu 'bab skad cig gis/ /zhi bar gyur pa de bzhin dug dag ni/ /me phung lta bur sngags kyis zhi bar byed/ /dug gi mthu stobs shes nas ra ba bsgrims nas/ /gsang sngags cho ga bzhin bzlas bsgrubs na ni/ /sbyor ba 'dis ni dug kyang 'phrog par byed/ /

ba lang khyu na seng ge ji lta bar/ /dug can sbrul dang dogs med lhan cig rtse/ /lha klu lha min gnod sbyin grub pa dang / /dri za 'byung po mtshun dang gsang ba dang / /sha za dang ni lus srul po/ /smyo byed mdangs 'phrogs pa dang grib non dang / /sa yi steng

na gdon ni sna tshogs pa/ /mi ye sha chil za zhing khrag kyang 'thung / /mya ngan 'dod gdungs khro bas nyam thag pa'i/ /glags skabs rnyed nas lus la 'jug par byed/ /de dag rnams kyis zin pa'i mi 'phyan cing / /glu len gar byed dgod dang khro ba dang / /dga' zhing rngam pa che la

smra 'dod dang / /spyod pa sna tshogs byed cing lha rnams dang / /lha min ltar 'chos skye bo'i bzhad gad byed/ /gtor ma 'dod pa'am rtsed mo byed 'dod pas/ /gsad pa'i don du lus la 'bab cing 'jug /gsang ba pa rnams gzhig phyir rig pa'i mchog /mthu chen mchog sbyin rdo rje lcags

kyu 'am/ /gzhan yang nga yi rigs byung rig pa'am/ /khra bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor sogs pas gso/ /ci ltar rig sngags 'dzin pa'i mi dag la/ /gdon rnams 'jigs par gyur pa de ltar ni/ /me min rlung min grong khyer sum brtsegs dag /'joms byed ga za chen nyi ma mes po dang / /chu

bdag ma yin lha min rnams kyis min/ /nor bdag ma yin gnod sbyin rgyal pos min/ /lhag ma mkha' lding bya yi rgyal po dang / /sa srung bu zhon khyer 'jigs rnams kyis min/ /'byung po'i rigs sngags 'dir ni kun mthong dang / /gdon gyis spyod pa ma lus shes nas su/ /

phyi nas gdon rnams dogs med btul nas ni/ /gdon gyis mi 'jigs slar yang tshugs mi 'gyur/ /rigs gsum 'phel dang srid gsum mthar phyin dang / /nyes pa gsum spangs lam gsum thugs chud dang / /de yi sras dang de'i lam rjes 'gro ba'i/ /lha dang lha min sogs pas

bshad pa'i sngags/ /bdag nyid chen po'i mun pa sel ba yi/ /gsang sngags kyis ni byin gyis brlabs de la/ /'jig rten lha tshogs rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/ /gsang sngags mthu yis de la bskyod du med/ /rdo rje 'chang gi gsung thos lha rnams dang / /tshangs sogs lha

min gnod sbyin grub pa dang / /rig 'dzin klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang / /gsang ba pa dang mtshun dang 'byung po rnams/ /dad pas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ /gus pas thal mo sbyar nas chig gsol pa/ /kye ma'o srog chags rnams la thugs rjer ldan/ /kye

ma'o khyod kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pas/ /kha cig gis ni rdo rje 'bar bar mthong / /gzhan gyis da byig to gzhan gyis 'khor lo can/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis rtse gsum zhags pa can/ /gzhan gyis ral gri gzhu dang be con dang / /'jigs pa'i gzugs can mtshon cha kun thogs

dang / /gzhan dag gis ni zhi ba nyid du mthong / /du ma'i sku mnga' dmigs med sku mnga' bar/ /lha dang gnod sbyin gyis mchod de la 'dud/ /lha min lha yis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rig pa'i dbang phyug gzhu 'gengs

khyod la 'dud/ /khyod la bdag cag thams cad phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /khyod la bdag cag deng nas skyabs su mchi/ /khyod kyis ci skad gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /mi yis legs par spyad pa bgyis na ni/ /de dag myur du dbul ba'i mun bsal nas/ /nyi ma bzhin du shin tu 'bar

bar 'gyur/ /yan lag mi nyams sems kyang mi nyams shing / /nad dang sdug bsngal lus nyams mi 'gyur ba/ /khyod la dang ba'i mis ni thob par 'gyur/ /de skad kun gyis tshig tu smras nas kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin la yang yang phyag 'tshal te/ /gzhal med theg par mngon du zhugs nas

kyang / /ci ltar 'ongs pa'i nam mkha'i lam la dong / /lha rnams dong nas phyag na rdo rje yis/ /dbung bzang la ni tshig tu yang gsungs pa/ /lha rnams kun gyis mdo 'di shes zin gyis/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten 'dir ni grags par gyis/ /de skad gsungs nas dbung bzang de yis ni/ /

langs te gus par rab tu phyag 'tshal nas/ /gtsang byed sdig 'joms dpal yon ldan pa 'di/ /mi yi 'jig rten khams 'dir bsgrags par bgyi/ /'phags pa dbung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i rgyud rdzogs // //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba maN+Dal sA mA n+ya bi d+hi na gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga gsang ba'i rgyud/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i rgyud/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad

kyi/ /spyi yi cho ga rgyas pa dag /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub la sogs gang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /rab tu gnas pa la sogs gang / /pad+mo rigs kyi ra bshad pa dang / /'jig rten dag la brtse phyir ngas/ /

rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/ /dkyil 'khor sum stong dag dang ni/ /lnga brgyar bshad pa gang yan pa/ /dkyil 'khor de dag rnams kyi spyi'i/ /cho ga 'di ni ngas bshad de/ /de lta bas na cho ga 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /slob dpon bstan bcos

kun shes pa/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing snying rje'i bdag /drang zhing bzod la gtsang sbra can/ /dad dang dran ldan snying stobs ldan/ /smra mkhas mi 'jigs sran thub pa/ /sgyu rtsal dag la mkhas shing gsal/ /mdzes dang ldan zhing de bzhin du/ /gus ldan dul la khong

gzo ba/ /rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'/ /theg pa che la mos pa can/ /gsang sngags spyod pa la bslabs shing / /dkyil 'khor dag gi bye brag shes/ /slob ma dag gi tshul shes shing / /de bzhin gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin/ /rjes su gnang zhing dbang bskur la/ /chog

shes bzlas brjod lhur len pa/ /slob dpon rigs la bsnyen bkur byas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad khong du chud/ /gsang sngags kun dang bla ma dang / /de bzhin glo bur 'gron mchod byed/ /phyag rgya la sogs bcing ba dang / /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las rnams dang / /

gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchod pa la/ /slob dpon gyis ni mkhas par bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni/ /sa yi phyogs kyi mtshan nyid de/ /sa gzhi ci 'dra bzang ba dang / /mi bzang bdag bsgrags pa'o/ /mthon dman can dang tsher ma can/ /gyo mo dum bu can dag dang / /ngam

grog rus pa sdong dum can/ /grog mkhar thal ba tshwa sgo can/ /gseg ma rdo dang rdul dang skra/ /srin bu grog spur la sogs mang / /de lta bu yi sa gzhi ni/ /mkhas pas las rnams kun la spang / /mthon dman snyoms shing gtsang la snum/ /zug rngu nyes pa rnam par

spangs/ /shar dang byang du gzhol ba yi/ /sa gzhi las rnams kun la shis/ /dang por pus nub tsam brkos la/ /sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya/ /gal te lhag par gyur na ni/ /dngos grubadag ni yod par ba shad/ /de las bzlog par gyur na ni/ /sgrub pa pos ni

las mi brtsam/ /brtsams na sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing / /legs pa dag kyang mi 'thob bo/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni gang dag gi/ /nye 'khor dag na chu mod pa/ /de ni shis shing dngos grub thob/ /chu dkon pa ni mkhas pas smad/ /kho ra khor yug sna tshogs

shing / /me tog 'bras bu lo mar ldan/ /'o ma can gyi shing yod pa/ /dkyil 'khor dag la rab tu shis/ /kho ra khor yug shing ldan pa'i/ /sa gzhi yon tan kun ldan te/ /nye 'khor na yang chu yod pa/ /dkyil 'khor dag la sa de shis/ /zhi ba'i las la sa gzhi

ni/ /dkar po dag tu brtag par bya/ /rgyas pa'i ched du dmar ser bya/ /drag shul spyod la nag po shis/ /gang du chu ngogs pad+mo yi/ /mtsho dang rgya mtsho nye 'khor dang / /chu yi gling ni nyams dga' bar/ /zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /ma mo'i gnas dang dur khrod

dang / /dben pa'i gnas dang khang stong dang / /nyams mi dga' ba'i yul gang yin/ /de dag tu ni mngon spyod bri/ /ri rtse dang ni ba lang lhas/ /mchod rten sku gzugs khang pa dang / /de la sogs pa'i phyogs dag tu/ /rgyas pa yi ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /mchod rten

chen po nyams dga' dang / /dben pa chen pa'i gnas dag dang / /ri bo'i rtse mo rgya chen gyi/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /ri rtse dag dang ri bo dang / /ri yi zom dang phug dag tu/ /lha min dag ni 'dod pa yis/ /sa 'og rdo rje dkyil 'khor bri/ /pad+ma'i kha ni bye ba'i

tshal/ /ngang skya dag ni sgra sgrogs par/ /rgyal srid 'dod pa'am nor 'dod pas/ /dpal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bri/ /ma mo'i gnas dang ri rtse dang / /lha rnams kyi ni gnas dag tu/ /gdon dbab pa dang 'joms byed pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i dkyil

'khor bri/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo chen po dang / /mchod rten phyag na rdo rje yi/ /mdun du sgrub pa po yis ni/ /khro rgyal dkyil 'khor bgegs 'joms bri/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /gnas ni bzang po gzhan du yang / /mkhas pa yis ni khyad par du/ /

thams cad bri bar bya ba yin/ /rab tu gnas sogs dkyil 'khor kun/ /mkhas pa yis ni khyad par du/ /pad+ma'i mtsho yi nye 'khor du/ /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /ri ye rtse mor mkhas pa yis/ /mdo las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin/ /rnam par gnon sogs dkyil

'khor kun/ /khyad par du ni bri bar bya/ /rnam par nges pa'i gnas 'di ni/ /khyad par du ni bstan pa yin/ /rab tu bsgrims te thams cad la/ /sa ni rnam gsum yongs su brtag /khyad par phun sum ma ldan na/ /spyi yi las kyis bri bar bya/ /phun sum tshogs par kun

bzang ba'i/ /tshogs pa dag ni rnyed par dka'/ /mdor na sa gzhi mnyam pa dang / /mdangs snum shar du gzhol ba bzhed/ /chu mang ldan pa'i gnas dang ni/ /ljon shing bzang pos brgyan pa dang / /bdag gi mig yid mgu ba dang / /'tshe med zug rngu spangs pa ni/ /dkyil

'khor gnas su shis pa ste/ /mi yi dngos grub kun thob byed/ /drang srong gnas dang ba glang lhas/ /phug dang ri yi rtse mo dang / /sa gzhi gang na 'thas pa dang / /khang thog dang ni rdo leb dang / /mchod rten drung dang 'bab chu'i gling / /mtsho rnams kyi ni 'gram dag tu/ /sa gzhi

sbyang zhing brtag pa dang / /nan tan du ni bya mi dgos/ /der ni zug rngu dbyung mi dgos/ /'thas par bcag kyang der mi dgos/ /mthon dman la sogs skyon rnams kyang / /der ni dogs pa bskyed mi dgos/ /gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa gzhi la/ /byi dor legs par byas nas

su/ /lag pas bram zhing gsang sngags bzlas/ /de yi sbyang ba de yin no/ /zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni/ /gal te dbyung bar mi nus na/ /der ni gsang sngags kho nas ni/ /sbyangs pa legs par byas par 'gyur/ /brtan par 'gyur ba'i las rnams dang / /gdon

rnams tshar gcad la sogs dang / /drag shul spyod pa dag la yang / /sa ni brtag par bya mi dgos/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi cho ga la/ /khro bo kI li kI la yis/ /ba yi rnam lnga la bzlas pa'i/ /bsang gtor byas na sbyangs par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyis mi thub la sogs

pa/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor nyid kyis sbyang / /phyag na pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /sa gzhi sbyang bar bya ba ni/ /zhi ba 'dren pa zhes bya yi/ /dpal mos cho ga bzhin du sbyang / /phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /khyad par du ni khro bos sbyang / /las su bya ba thams cad kyang / /

cho ga bzhin du 'di yis bya/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug dang zhi ba'i 'dren/ /khro bo stobs chen zhes bya ba/ /'di gsum rigs ni gsum car gyis/ /las rnams kun la sbyar byas te/ /sa sbyang ba dang bsrung ba dang / /slob ma sta gon gnas pa dang / /bgegs rnams bsal dang dri dag

dang / /me tog mngon par bsngags pa dang / /de la sogs pa'i las kun la/ /bsgrims te sbyang bar bya ba yin/ /so so'i rgyud la las dang ni/ /gsang sngags rab tu bsgrags pa gang / /ston zla 'bring po'i nya nas ni/ /dpyid zla tha chung sa nya yi bar/ /'di yi nang du mkhas

pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bri/ /bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor nang gcad dang / /de bzhin bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dag /dpyad mi dgos par dbyar yang ni/ /mkhas pas dus bzhin bri bar bya/ /slob ma dbang bskur ched du ni/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su bsgrags

gang dang / /gnang ba'i dkyil 'khor gang yin dang / /da ma tshig dkyil 'khor gang yin dang / /'byor pa'i ched du bsgrub pa dang / /chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa/ /de dag thams cad mkhas pa yis/ /zla ba bdun po dag la bya/ /yul dang dus dang slob ma dang / /bdeg

pa'i yon tan shes bya ste/ /mkhas pas dbyar yang dkyil 'khor gyi/ /las ni cho ga bzhin du bri/ /dri dang me tog bdug spos dang / /lha ba shos sbyin sreg las kyi rnams/ /phongs par gyur kyang mi da bri ste/ /phri na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /tshes grangs ngan

dang dus min dang / /gnas min cho ga mi ldan par/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mi bri'o/ /bris na dogs pa med par 'chi/ /mkhas pas ji skad bshad pa yi/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo dag la/ /zla ba nya 'am bcu gsum mam/ /tshes brgyad dag gam bcu bzhi 'am/ /tshes bcu dang

ni bcu gcig gam/ /yang na yar gyi tshes gcig gam/ /tshes lnga'am yang na tshes bdun nam/ /yang na tshes grangs gsum la'ang rung / /nyi ma bcu po 'di dag la/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrims te bri/ /mar gyi ngo yi dus mtshams la'ang / /dkyil 'khor bri ba 'gal

ba med/ /tshes lnga'am yang na tshes bdun nam/ /zla ba nya la khyad par du/ /phyag na pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /cho ga rnams ni bya bar shis/ /sa yi 'og gi dkyil 'khor dang / /drag shul gyi ni las rnams dang / /khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gang / /de dag mar ngo la yang

bri/ /zla ba nya la khyad par du/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar shis/ /dpyid zla 'bring dang tha chung sa la/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor chen po bri/ /gang tshe yo byad ldan pa dang / /gang tshe dad pa bdo ba dang / /gang tshe las la brtson gyur pa/ /de yi tshe yang dkyil 'khor bri/ /gang tshe

'tsho ba kun mod cing / /me tog mod pa la sogs pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i dus shes pa'i/ /de yi tshe yang dkyil 'khor bri/ /gang tshe slob ma'i bsnyen bkur gyis/ /bla ma dag ni mgu gyur pa/ /de tshe de lag na nga bas na/ /dbang bskur ched du dkyil 'khor bri/ /nyi ma zla ba

gzas zin dang / /ya mtshan che ltas byung ba dang / /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla ba la/ /bsgrims te dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /snga dro rgyas pa bskyed pa ste/ /nyi ma gung la drag shul spyad/ /dgongs kar zhi ba blo can gyis/ /cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni ma lus pa/ /

nyi ma tser tses nub nas brtsam/ /nyi ma shar bar ma gyur par/ /mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar shis/ /khyad par can gyi cho ga ni/ /lha dus bya ba dus bzhin bshad/ /gzhan du cho ga nyams pa'i phyir/ /dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /spyi yi dkyil 'khor blo

ldan pas/ /nam yang nyin par mi bri'o/ /nyin par bris na de dag tu/ /sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /dgongs mgo btsugs nas nam phyed na/ /drag shul spyod par gyur pa yin/ /mtshan mo dus las 'das pas na/ /nyes pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

mtshan mo rab tu zhi ba'i phyir/ /spyir na 'dod par bya ba yin/ /dam tshig dag la sogs pa'i las/ /de lta bas na mtshan mo brtsam/ /nyi ma nub na lha rnams ni/ /nges par byin gyi rlabs kyis 'du/ /gzhan dag kyang ni khyad par du/ /byin gyis rlob par byed par 'gyur/ /cho

gas spyan drangs gsang sngags dang / /lha yang nyi ma nub pa na/ phan par bzhed pas dkyil 'khor du/ /nges par byin gyis rlob par mdzad/ /yang dag zhi ba'i sems kyis ni/ /dus dang ches grangs zhi ba la/ /sngags kyis spyan 'dren byed pa ni/ /bsams pa'i

dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /phur bu dang ni zla ba dang / /pa ba sangs dang nyi ma bzang / /gzhan la rab tu drag po yi/ /las ni kun du brtsam par bya/ /rgyal dang skag dang sa ga dang / /me bzhi nag pa tha skar dang / /snron la sogs gsum sa ga ni/ /dkyil 'khor

dag la rab tu shis/ /de la sogs pa'i zhi ba dang / /rgyu skar dag ni bzang po la/ /blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /drag po la ni drag po bri/ /'bebs ldan rnam rgyal rgyal byed dang / /gsal dang dmar ldan nor can dang / /bzang mo chu lha tshangs ma dang / /des dang bkra

shis khyab 'jug dang / /skye dgu'i bdag dang tha skar byams/ /tshig bzang pa ba sangs pa'o/ /yud tsam rnams kyi rgyud kun gyi/ /bya ba'i cho ga rnams las shis/ /de dag la sogs bzang po dang / /byed pa bzang la rtag tu bri/ /mi bzang ba la brtsams pa'i

las/ /gang du ci yang mi 'grub bo/ /de lta bas na yud tsam dang / /tshes grangs rgyu skar byed pa dang / /rmi lam bzang po brtag par bya/ /bzang po dag la las brtsam ste/ /bzang po min la brtsam mi bya/ /bzang po min pa'i las rnams kyang / /bzang po

nyid la brtsam par bya/ /ltas ni bzang dang mi bzang bas/ /grub pa dang ni mi grub ston/ /de lta bas na brtsams pa la/ /mtshan ma rab tu 'bad de brtag /de nas gzhan yangs dag ni/ /sbyang bar bya bar rab tu bshad/ /zhag bdun gyi ni nang logs su/ /ji ltar rigs

pas bsrung byas te/ /'jor gyis sa ni bzlog byas shing / /de nas zug rngu dbyung bar bya/ /zug rngu bcas pa'i sa gzhi ni/ /las byas pa dag 'grub mi 'gyur/ /zug rngu nyes pa rus pa dang / /gyo mo dang ni thal ba dang / /sdong du ma dang ni tsher ma dag /rab tu bsgrims te

ma lus dbyung / /de nas tho bas bong ba dag /bkrum nas zhib mor byas te ba cag /de nas ba yi gcin gyis ni/ /yang nas yang du gdab bya zhing / /lag mthil lta bur mnyam byas shing / /ba yi lci ba chur sbyangs nas/ /shar phyogs nas ni mgo btsugs te/ /blo dang ldan

pas legs par byug /de nas de yi dbus su ni/ /khung bu cung zhig brkos nas der/ /'bru rnams dang ni rin chen kun/ /sngags kyis btab ste gzhug par bya/ /de ltar sbyangs shing dbyig dag gi/ /dbyig dang ldan par byas nas ni/ /blo dang ldan pas ci rigs par/ /

sa gzhi yongs su gzung bya ba/ /yang dag bsdams pas zhag gsum na/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags dang / /gang gi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa/ /de dag gis ni yongs gzung bya/ /gcig gis dri yi chu yis ni/ /dngos su bsang gtor bya ba ste/ /cig shos kyi

ni lag pa yis/ /sa la bram ste mngon par bsngags/ /bla yis yongs su gzung byas na/ /gnas ni yongs su bzung ba yin/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /de nas slob ma yongs su gzung / /bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba'i skud/ /blangs nas bzhi bcu rtsa

dgu bzlas/ /slob ma rnams ni blos bsams nas/ /mnyam par gzhag ste mdud pa bor/ /de nas slob mas yongs bzung nas/ /las la bgegs ni med par 'gyur/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i tshe/ /do nub lta bu sta gon gnas/ /thog ma nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ /

sa phyogs kyi ni chad ga brtag /de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa dag /yid kyis legs par yongs su brtag /sngags rgyud dag las 'byung ba'i zas/ /bzang la gtsang zhing snum bag can/ /rjes su mthun zhing yid 'ong ba/ /slob mar bcas pas ran par bza'/ /de nas nub kar

khrus byas shing / /gtsang la gos ni dkar po bgos/ /bla ma slob ma dang bcas par/ /dkyil 'khor drung du dong bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa gzhi ni/ /byi dor legs byas legs byugs la/ /khro bo chen po bzlas pa yi/ /spos chus bsang gtor byas pa la/ /dbus

su sta gon gnas pa dag /rigs rnams kyi ni snying po bzlas/ /dkyil 'khor ba dag po'i gsang sngags kyis/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba bshad/ /sa gzhi steng du byug spos kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sor grangs bcu gnyis bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rig sngags kyis/ /lag

pas bram zhing lan bdun bzlas/ /de nas gtso bo lha rnams ni/ /ming gis yid la bsams nas su/ /byug spos me tog la sogs pas/ /snying pos ci rigs mchod par bya/ /lha bshos dag kyang dbul bar bya/ /bdug spos mngon par bsngags pa'ang dbul/ /de nas tsan+dan

sbyar ba yi/ /chu la mngon par bsngags bya zhing / /de la me tog gis gtor nas/ /cho ga bzhin du bdug pas bdug /so shing u dum ba ra 'am/ /a shwat+tha ni rma med pa/ /ha cang mi sbom mi phra ba'i/ /sor grangs bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /spos kyi chus ni legs par bkrus/ /

skud pa dag gis rnam par dkris/ /spos kyis byugs shing bdug pas bdug /lag pas bram zhing rigs kyi ni/ /snying po lan grangs mang po'am/ /yang na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya/ /slob ma rnams kyi grangs las ni/ /so shing la sogs gsog par bya/ /so shing mgo zhabs

bsnyams byas la/ /thor to gcig ni mgor byas nas/ /rtse mo nas ni bca' bar bya/ /de nas mkhas pas gnas dang ni/ /bdag dang slob ma brtan bsrungs nas/ /lha rnams thams cad legs mchod de/ /dang por bgegs ni zhi ba'i phyir/ /mar las

btags pa'i yam shing dang / /mar dang sbyar ba'i til dag dang / /mar gyi sreg blugs sbyin sreg bya/ /'bras chan zhor sbyar sbyin sreg bya/ /de yi 'og tu snying po ste/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni/ /zhi ba'i rig sngags nyid kyis bya/ /de nas slob ma legs brtags te/ /sta

gon gnas pa tshul bzhin bya/ /slob ma rigs btsun gtsang sbra can/ /snying stobs che zhing chos lhur len/ /dad pa che zhing bzod dang ldan/ /dran dang ldan zhing mkhas pa ste/ /drang rkan che la mdongs gsol can/ /brtan zhing dul la snyan par smra/ /smra mkhas pa la zlo bskyel

can/ /yang dag shes shing byas pa gzo/ /blo dang ldan zhing spobs pa che/ /chen por 'dod cing nga rgyal med/ /mdog dang gzugs dang na tshod bzang / /bstan bcos dag la goms par byas/ /ha cang mi ring mi thung la/ /de la sogs pa'i yon tan dang / /ldan pa'i blo can

slob mar shis/ /rang bzhin ngan gtum g.yon can dang / /snying rje med cing ngan pas 'tsho/ /yan lag nyams dang yan lag lhag /ha cang sbom dang skem dang sdar/ /mig dmar gdong ni khro gnyer can/ /kha dog 'byes shing yan lag rnams/ /mtshan dang ldan pa ma yin dang / /

de 'dra'i slob ma skyon mang ba/ /slob dpon gyis ni spang bar bya/ /sha tshugs ma legs yon tan med/ /rigs dman zhing ni ngan pas 'tsho/ /nad bu can dang dad med pa'i/ /slob ma rnams ni yongs su spang / /bdag nyid ngan pa'i mi gang dag /smad 'tshong ma la rab gdung

zhing / /chang dad can dang rgyan la sred/ /de dag rtag tu yongs su spang / /dkon mchog gsum la sems dad cing / /tshul khrims kyi ni sdom pas bsdams/ /theg pa che la lhag mos pa'i/ /slob ma yongs su gzung bar shis/ /slob ma yan lag ma nyams dang / /lhag

par yon tan ldan pa dang / /nad med rigs ni btsun pa dang / /dad cing brtul zhugs brtan par dkon/ /dkon mchog gsum la gang dad cing / /theg pa chen po'i lugs la dga'/ /bsod nams 'dod pa'i sems can ni/ /chen po de dag mdor gzung ngo / /

bder gshegs gsang sngags bsgrub pa la/ /don gnyer brtson pa'i slob ma ni/ /gzugs ngan yon tan mi ldan yang / /blo dang ldan pas gzhug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga 'khor bzhi po/ /theg pa che la dga' ba'i bad ga /rang gi bslab pa la brtson pa/ /kun gyi

cho ga yin par bshad/ /kha cig gsang sngags bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /de las gzhan pa bsod nams 'dod/ /gzhan dag 'jig rten pha rol don/ /'di na dkyil 'khor 'jug par byed/ /'jig rten pha rol ched du ni/ /dad pa chen po bskyed byas nas/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor

'jug bya yi/ /tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod mi bya/ /'jig rten pha rol don du ni/ /skyes bu tshe 'di 'bras rgyas pa/ /de ltar tshe 'di 'dod pa yi/ /'jig rten pha rol rgyas mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pas slob ma gcig gam gsum/ /lnga'am yang na bdun dag gam/ /nyi shu dag ni

lnga yi bar/ /zung du ma gyur slob ma gzung / /de las lhag pa'i slob ma dag /yongs su gzung bar mi shes so/ /mdor na slob ma phan tshun du/ /nang mi gshin pa mi bzung ngo / /gcig la gcig ni sems gzung zhing / /zhi dul bla ma la phan pa/ /'phags pa'i yul dang rigs skyes

pa'i/ /slob ma mdor na gzung bar bya/ /de dag bsreg par bya ba yis/ /zas ni za gcig bza' bar bya/ /de yi nub mo ci nus par/ /de bzhin sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug /gtsang ma gos dkar bgos pa yi/ /slob ma de lta bu dag ga/ shar phyogs kha bltas 'khod pa la/ /sta gon

gnas pa brtsam par bya/ /dang po gsum la skyabs su btang / /de nas bla mas byang chub sems/ /ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/ /bskyed pa dag kyang dran par bya/ /de nas khro bo bzlas pa yis/ /spos chu mgo la gtor bya zhing / /mgo la brams te mnyam bzhag nas/ /lan

bdun du yang bzlas brjod bya/ /byug spos dag gis bskus pa yi/ /lag pas mgo la bzhag bzhin du/ /mkhas pas rig pa'i rgyal po yi/ /snying po yang ni la na bdun bzlas/ /rgyal ba'i rigs la rig sngags rgyal/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i yi ge

gcig /pad+ma'i rigs la rig sngags rgyal/ /rta mgrin yi ge bcu pa'o/ /rdo rje rigs la rig sngags rgyal/ /de bzhin gnod mdzes mthu bo che/ /yi ge hU~M ni bzhi dang ldan/ /las rnams kun la rab tu drag /khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor ni/ /rigs gsum dag gi spyi la yang / /bgegs

rnams thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba pa ya bdag pos bshad/ /de nas la sa kun byed pa yi/ /sngags kyis spyi bor bram zhing bzlas/ /de nyid kyis ni bsang gtor bya/ /bdug spos dag gis rab tu bdug /dbang bskur ba yi bum pa ni/ /'bru la sogs pa kun

ldan pa/ /chu ni cung zad blugs nas su/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos mngon bsngags te/ /spos chu'i mchod yon phul nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du sta gon bya/ /me tog dag kyang blugs nas su/ /bdug spos dag gis bdug par bya/ /phyi de nyin par dus gsum du/ /mkhas pas bzlas

brjod legs par bya/ /dkyil 'khor du yang bzlas nas ni/ /de yis mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /slob ma mthun par tshogs pa rnams/ /byang gi phyogs su kha bltas shing / /thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la/ /so shing bzhin du sbyin/ /slob ma shar du kha bltas te/ /mi

smra bar ni so shing bca'/ /bca' ba zin nas mi dgos shing / /phan tshun du yang mi dor ro/ /so shing mdun du drang por dor/ /de tshe mdun du lta ba dang / /de tshe gyen du 'greng 'gyur na/ /de ni dngos grub mchog ces bya/ /de bzhin shar du kha bltas na/ /de ni dngos grub 'bring du

bshad/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'grub/ /so shing bor ba brgya lam na/ /gal te thur du kha bltas na/ /de ni nges par sa 'og gi/ /dngos grub de la the tshom ma med/ /slob ma nye reg byas nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du 'khod pa la/ /re re la

yang btung ba'i phyir/ /bla mas las kun byed pa yi/ /gsang sngags dag gi spos kyi chus/ /khyor bar blugs pas lan bdun blud/ /der ni 'thungs te langs nas su/ /phyi rol du ni kha bkru bya/ /de nas mchod pa yang byas nas/ /bdug spos lag tu thogs nas su/ /

blo gros can gyis lha rnams la/ /gus par gsol ba gdab par bya/ /gang gi dkyil 'khor yin pa'i sngags/ /de la thog mar gdas par gsol/ /de yi tshul gyis ni/ /lha rnams kun la gdas par gsol/ /'di zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das/ /rig

sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni brtse bar gyur nas su/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnang ba mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas

'jig rten mgon brtse dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gsang sngags lha gzhan gang lags dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang / /gang su lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /

bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sang gi dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming / /'di zhes bgyi ba ci nus kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du 'dri lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su/ /tshogs

pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum smras nas ni/ /bsam pa dag pas phyag byas te/ /bstod pa'i tshig kyang brjod nas su/ /de nas slar yang gshegs su gsol/ /'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos/ /

slob ma rnams la bshad nas ni/ /ku sha bting ba'i sa gzhi la/ /shar phyogs sngas ltas nyal du gzhug /de nas nang par nam langs nas/ /rmi lam ci mthong dri bar bya/ /thos nas bzang ngam mi bzang ba/ /the tshom med par bshad par bya/ /rmi lam sangs rgyas

mthong na ni/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/ /mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong / /de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang / /dge slong dag la chos nyan tam/ /yang na gzhan la nyan kyang rung / /chos ni rnam par spyod pa dang / /de bzhin glegs bam klog pa dang / /

rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang / /yang na dge slong gcig po mthong / /de dang 'grags shing gtam zer dang / /yang na dge slong dngos por gyur/ /gtsug lag khang dag mthong ba dang / /de bzhin dge slong ma dag mthong / /rgyal ba'i sras dag mthong ba dang / /de bzhin pha ma

bla ma dang / /mdza' bo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rmi lam du ni mthong na shis/ /rig sngags dang ni dngos grub thob/ /de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / /kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang / /ri dang glang po che dag kyang / /mthong na yang ni

bzang bar bsgrags/ /rgyal po dag ni mthong na shis/ /bder gshags spyod pa mthun pa yi/ /dka' thub can dang bram ze dang / /phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang / /ba dang rta dang ngang pa dang / /seng ge dang ni rnams/ /rmi lam du ni mthong na shis/ /bkra shis pa

yi bya rnams dang / /gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang / /rin po che dang dngul dag dang / /nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa tshogs/ /mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang / /'bras bu rnams dang me tog dang / /rgyan ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /kha zas

dang ni gos rnams dang / /byis pa dang ni gzhon nu dang / /bud med gzugs ni bzang mo dag /rmi lam du ni mthong na bzang / /yang na thob cing reg smra dang / /rmi lam du ni dbang bskur dang / /rgyal por gyur pa'i 'byor pa dang / /dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang / /g.yul las

rgyal dang dgra gsod dang / /gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang / /lha rnams dag ni mthong ba dang / /theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon/ /de bzhin ri dang khang thog 'dzeg /ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rmi lam du ni mthong na dge/ /yam shing me la sbyin sreg byed/ /bya ba bzang po

dag la 'jug /chu las rkyal te rong las rgal/ /rkun po dag ni tshar gcod pa/ /stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang / /gyad stobs rdeb cing 'gying ba dang / /rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang / /de bzhin rtsal sbungs byed pa dang / /bkra shis dag ni thams cad kyang / /

mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad/ /gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang / /dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang / /bsgrub pa bzang po rtsom pa dang / /sgrub pa po dag mthong ba dang / /de la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni/ /dge ba rnam pa du ma dag /blo yis rnam par dpyad bya zhing / /de

las bzlog pa spang bar bya'o/ /dge ba rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi dge rnams ni mi 'grub bo/ /mi dge ba dag shes nas su/ /de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya/ /dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma las/ /gsang sngags dngos grub rnam gsum

po/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma 'grub/ /mi dge ba la zhi ba yi/ /sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /ba yi mar la brgya rtsa brgyad/ /cho ga bzhin du zhi bar bya/ /de nas slob ma sdig bral zhing / /rnam par dag pa de dag la/ /rjes su brtse bar bya ba'i phyir/ /

ci 'dod par ni gzung bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni gsang sngags kun/ /nang par rjes su dran byas nas/ /gos dkar bgos shing ma yengs par/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung du 'gro/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /thog ma nyid du bsang gtor bya/ /tshon sna lnga

yi srad bu la/ /de dag nyid kyis brgyar bzlas te/ /bzang po'i ltas dang sbyar nas ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor zig gdab bo/ /thig skud kyi ni tshon sna lnga/ /dkar dang dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /sngo dang lnga pa nag po ste/ /tshon rtsi rnams kyang de dang 'dra/ /dkon mchog

gsum la mchod bya zhing / /lha rnams gnas la'ang phyag byas nas/ /mkhas pas srad bu bri bar bya/ /nang par nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ /blo yis phyogs cha legs brtags la/ /dang por shar nas bsnyams te gzung / /slob dpon byang du kha bltas te/ /srad bu 'dzin pa de la

blta/ /de nas g.yas phyogs bskor nas ni/ /bdag nyid nub phyogs kha bltas te/ /de nas srad bu nub phyogs su/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bre bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu byang phyogs su/ /mkhas pas srad bu bre bar bya/ /dang por bdag nyid me phyogs su/ /

'dug nas phyogs gnyis brtag par bya/ /de yi 'og tu rlung phyogs su/ /phyogs gnyis nas ni srad bu bre/ /bden bral dbang ldan gra gnyis nas/ /srad bu 'dzin pa blta bar bya/ /gru bzhi lha ma par bsnyams nas su/ /rgya gram du ni srad bu bre/ /rgya gram thams cad

mnyam par bsnyams/ /de ltar srad bus gtan la dbab/ /bsnyams nas de yi dkyil du ni/ /phur bu gcig kyang gdab par bya/ /de nas de yi 'og tu yang / /grwa bzhir phur bu bzhi gdab bo/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa legs par grwa dag

nas/ /che chung dag kyang rim pa bzhin/ /yongs su brtsam par bya bar bshad/ /rim gyis phyed phyed da bri bar bar bya/ /de las gzhan pa'i 'khor gyi ni/ /dkyil 'khor bshad pa gang yin pa/ /de kun phye ma dkar po yis/ /chig rkyang du ni bri bar ba shad/ /dkyil 'khor nyis

rim sum rim mam/ /bzhi 'am mang por bya ba la/ /phyi rim gang yin de la ni/ /sgo gcig pa dang rgya cher bya/ /gzhan ni phyogs kyi cha bzhin du/ /sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bya/ /yang na thams cad dogs med par/ /sgo re re bzhi bya ba yin/ /snying po dkyil 'khor nges par

ni/ /rab tu bzang po sgo bzhir bya/ /nub phyogs sgo 'am yang na ni/ /gang las ji skad bshad par dbye/ /lhag ma rnams ni dkar po yi/ /phye mas gcad par bya ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dgod pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu mang bshad kyang / /de ni dkyil

'khor mang po dag /rnam par dgod pa bshad pa gang / /de dag rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /rnam par dbye ba yin par grags/ /lha yi gtso bor gyur pa rnams/ /rtag tu dkyil du dgod par bya/ /de yi lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /gnyis pa dag tu dgod par bya/ /

'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa bsdu bar bshad/ /de las gzhan rnams ji skad du/ /bshad pa de bzhin kho nar dgod/ /dkyil 'khor thig gdab thig skud ni/ /kha bsgyur gtsang ma sra zhing phra/ /de bzhin bu mo gzhon nus bkal/ /sar pa shin

tu gtsang ma dang / /mdzes shing shin tu ran pa dag /dri zhim reg na bde ba dang / /legs par bkal dang sra ba dang / /sbom phra la sogs bkal legs dang / /'jur mdud med par gyur pa yi/ /thig skud me tog spos mchod pas/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bo//

mchod sbyin shing gi phur bu dag /thur du rtse bstan mngon bsngags pa/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga la/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu gdab par bya/ /ltas ngan byung na dngos mi 'grub/ /srad bu chad na bla ma 'chi/ /ring thung khyer na nad kyis 'debs/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma

myos par 'gyur/ /de bas thams cad nan tan du/ /mkhas pas legs par thig gdab bo// //khyim sa'i dpyad la sa ci byung ba'i/ /sa yi nges pa de dang 'dra/ /de nas bla mas ci 'byor pas/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun chos ston gsol/ /yang na bla mas bsgos pa

yi/ /slob ma rnams kyis chos ston gsol/ /gal te mi 'byor dge 'dun gyis/ /bskos pa'i dge slong chos ston sbyin/ /yang na sangs rgyas mchod pa'am/ /dge 'dun dag la yon yang dbul/ /bla ma slob ma dang bcas par/ /khro bo rgyal po rjes dran zhing / /skyu ru ra

la sogs pa yis/ /phyi dro tshul bzhin khrus bya'o/ /khrus byas gtsang zhing gos dkar bgos/ /yo byad rnam pa kun dang ldan/ /byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung du 'dong / /bla mas tshogs rnams kun bsags shing / /lta ba ngan pa thams cad

spangs/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba thams cad la/ /bla mas mkhas pa dag tu bya/ /dang por dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la/ /ba yi gcin dang bsres pa yi/ /ba yi lci bas bsku bya zhing / /de nas spos chus bsang gtor bya/ /sa gzhi kho ra khor yug tu/ /chag chag gdab cing phyag dang

bya/ /yid ni mos par bya ba'i phyir/ /me tog sil ma gtor bar bya/ /srad bu dag gis yongs su bskor/ /rgyal mtshan rta babs dag gis mtshan/ /brgyus pa'i phreng ba rnams bre zhing / /bkra shis cho gar bstan par bya/ /de nas byang gi phyogs gcig

tu/ /yo byad thams cad gsog par bya/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos bsrungs nas su/ /blo dang ldan pas dgod par bya/ /gnas ni bsang gtor bya ba dang / /bgegs rnams bsal bar byas nas ni/ /bdag dang dkyil 'khor dag kyang ni/ /dang por kun nas bsrung bya ste/ /

bkra shis ltas dang sbyar nas ni/ /mos pa'i sems ni bskyed bya zhing / /mtshams kyi dus su bab pa yi/ /srod kyi dus la brtsam par bya/ /ltas dang mi ldan gyur na yang / /sems ni zhum par mi bya bar/ /rigs gsum dag la phyag byas nas/ /dal gyis legs

par brtsam par bya/ /ltas ngan dag ni yang dang yang / /bstud mar byung bar gyur na ni/ /de na dngos grub med gyur gyis/ /de tshe brtsam par mi bya yi/ /yang na de ni zhi ba'i phyir/ /yam shing me ni 'bar ba la/ /ba yi mar las brgya rtsa brgyad/ /zhi ba'i phyir ni sbyin sreg

bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis zhi bar bya/ /pad+ma'i rigs la grags ldan ma/ /rdo rje'i rigs la mA ma kI/ /rigs gsum dag gi spyi la yang / /rig sngags chen mo ma ma ka/ /blo dang ldan pas las kun la/ /de bas des ni zhi bar bya/ /

dkyil 'khor ba dag po cho ga bzhin/ /de nas mchod yon dbul bar bya/ /snod ni gser dang dngu la dag dang / /zangs la byas pa'am dung yang rung / /shing la byas pa'am rdo dag gam/ /kham pa sar pa'i gtsang ma'ang rung / /der ni me tog dkar po blugs/ /bdug spos kyis

kyang bdug par bya/ /de nas dri zhim chu blugs nas/ /blo ldan la ga gi bram bya zhing / /bdug spos kyis ni bdug bzhin du/ /yid kyis rab tu bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas blo dang ldan pa yis/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlos byed cing / /sa yi dbus kyi phyogs su ni/ /pus

mo gnyis btsugs mchod yon dbul/ /yang na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/ /las la mchod yon don du ni/ /me tog dkar po'am bdug spos ni/ /bzang po'am dri zhim byug spos dbul/ /bdug spos dag dang byug spos ni/ /srog chags yan lag bcas pa spang / /

las su bya ba thams cad la/ /chu ni gtsang ma btsag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu tshig rkyang ba'i/ /byug spos dag gam bdug spos dag /me tog skam las skyes pa ni/ /dri zhim pa dang dkar po shis/ /de nas slob ma bsogs nas ni/ /spos kyi chu yis bsang gtor bya/ /

tshogs pa bsrung ba byas pa rnams/ /phyogs gcig tu ni bkod nas su/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bklags te/ /gus par yang ni phyag byas nas/ /'phags pa'i tshogs kun bsams nas su/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /mkhas pas lcags ni rnam lnga'am/ /phye ma

dkar po la sogs pa'am/ /dad cing yon tan ldan pa yi/ /slob mas rin chen phye mas bri/ /rin chen lcags rnams ma 'byor na/ /sa lu btags pa'i phye mas bya/ /tshon rtsi lngar bshad zhib mo dang / /'byung khungs nas byung phye ma dang / /rdo yi khams ni sna tshogs

dag /phye ma'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /de ltar rnam pa bzhi po dag /phye ma'i rgyur ni bsgrags pa yin/ /lcags rnams kun dang rin chen dang / /'byung khungs sa dang 'bras btags pa/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi las rnams la/ /phye ma'i don du sbyar bar bya/ /yang na las

kyi cho ga la/ /phye ma dmar po so phag bsregs/ /nag po thal ba dkar po ni/ /nas dang gro las byas pa gnang / /bya ba rings pa 'byung ba dang / /bgegs rnams tshar gcad bya ba dang / /drag shul spyad pa'i las dag gi/ /dkyil 'khor las la thal ba gnang / /

dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga la/ /phye ma'i rgyu ni sngar bshad pa/ /kun kyang rung ste khyad par du/ /dang po la sogs rim bzhin shis/ /da ma tshig las la lcags kyi bzang / /rin chen las byung dbang bskur la/ /sA lu'i phye ma zhi ba la/ /'byung khungs las byung rgyas pa la/ /

drag shul spyod la khyad par du/ /thal ba la sogs bya bar shis/ /de ni phye ma'i cho ga'i rim/ /khyad par dang bcas bstan pa yin/ /byang shar mtshams nas brtsams nas su/ /rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba'am/ /yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'am/ /

lhung bzed rgya yi sbyor ba'am/ /yang na rig byed lag pas bri/ /dkar po dang por dgye bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu dmar po dgye/ /de nas ser po dgye bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu ljang gu dgye/ /sngags pas kun gyi phyi rol du/ /tshon rtsi nag po dgye bar bya/ /g.yas su bskor

zhing rgyun mi bcad/ /thams cad mnyam zhing bar chad med/ /ngan pa dang ni nyams pa dang / /ma snyoms pa dang bar chad na/ /gnod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan cher byas te/ /mkhas pas phye ma dgye bar bya/ /phyogs rnams kun du mkhas pa yis/ /

dbus su sgo ni gdod par bya/ /ngos gnyis su ni tsha dag kyang / /bzhi bzhi dag ni dor bar bya/ /chab sgo chen po stegs bur bcas/ /gcig ni lhag par bya/ /chab sgo gzhan rnams bcad par ni/ /phye ma dkar po dag gis ni/ /sgo yi dbus kyi cha dag tu/ /ri mo phra

mo bri bar bya/ /yang na sgo yi phyag rgya'am/ /sgo srungs ji ltar 'dod par bri/ /dang po tshon rtsi sna lngas bri/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa sna gsum gyis/ /gsum pa phye ma dkar po yis/ /gcig rkyang du ni bri bar bya/ /gzhan yang kha cig gang bshad pa/ /de yi ri mo gcig

rkyang nyid/ /thal phyer bshad pa gang yin pa/ /de dag thams cad ri mo gcig /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /cha gsum du ni legs brtags la/ /chu zheng dag ni cha gnyis kyang / /shin tu legs par nges par bya/ /rnam par dbye ba 'di dag ni/ /rigs gsum

dag gis spyir bstan no/ /yang na so so rgyud rnams las/ /ji skad bshad bzhin bya/ /lha yi gnas kyi sa gzhi rnams/ /ba glang lci bas bsku bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu khyad par du/ /ba yi rnam lnga'i chu yis bsku/ /thams cad spos kyi chus gtor nas/ /de yi 'og tu

phye ma dgye/ /rig sngags rgyal pos mngon bsngags pa'i/ /spos kyi chu yis gtor bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi cho ga ni/ /rnam pa gsum po ma lus la/ /lha rnams thams cad dgod pa ni/ /rnam pa gsum du rab tu bshad/ /dang po gzugs su bri bar bshad/ /

gnyis pa dag ni phyag rgya bri/ /gsum pa stan dang gnas dag tu/ /bri ba'i cho ga yongs su bsgrags/ /blo dang ldan pas gzugs kyi tshul/ /bri ba de la mkhas par bya/ /gtsang mas bsgrims te rang gi ni/ /ngo bo ji skad bshad bzhin bri/ /gzugs dang 'tsham par yan

lag gdags/ /gsal zhing rnam par 'byes par bri/ /gzugs kyang dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni/ /tshad dang sbyar zhing bya bar bsgrags/ /rang gi lung las kha dog gzugs/ /'byung ba bzhin du gzugs bris te/ /ci nas yan lag ma nyams shing / /rang bzhin zhi

ba'i gzugs su bri/ /gsang sngags cho ga shes pa yis/ /cho ga 'di yis dkyil 'khor bri/ /blo dang ldan pa ma bslabs pas/ /phyag rgya rnams su dgod par bya/ /bslabs pas kyang ni phye ma yis/ /yan lag rdzogs par rab tu dka'/ /yan lag rdzogs shing rgyas

bya na/ /cho ga'i las la ring du thogs/ /gzugs rnams legs par bsgrubs na ni/ /mang po rnams ni zin mi 'gyur/ /yan lag nyams na byin mi rlob/ /dngos mi 'grub par rab tu bshad/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa yis/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs su lha rnams

dgod/ /yang na rigs gsum bdag po rnams/ /ci 'dod par ni gzugs su dgod/ /de la sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi/ /phyag rgya gtsug tor bzhin/ /yid la de yi sngags zlos shing / /phye ma dkar pos bri bar bya/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ /

phyag rgya pad+mar rab tu bsgrags/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje rnon po rtse gsum 'bar/ /lha rnams gzhan gyi phyag rgya ni/ /lung las ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /yang na rigs kyi bdag po'i rgya/ /de dang der ni spyi yi yin/ /lha rnams gang dang gang dag gi/ /mtshan ma gang

dang gang yin pa/ /de dang de dag de yi rgya/ /'di ni ma nor mdor bshad bya/ /drag po'i phyag rgya rtse gsum rno/ /dka' zlog phyag na rtse gsum gdengs/ /khyab 'jug gi ni 'khor lo rno/ /sde chen gyi ni mdung thung yin/ /tshangs pa'i pad+ma yin par bshad/ /

brgya byin gyi ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /me lha'i phyag rgya zhugs thab yin/ /gshin rje'i phyag rgya be con yin/ /bden bral gyi ni ral gri yin/ /chu bdag gi ni zhags par bshad/ /rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin/ /ku be ra yi dbyug to ste/ /dbang bdag gi ni rtse gsum

gsungs/ /'di brgyad phyogs kyi lha brgyad kyi'o/ /sa yi phyag rgya bum pa yin/ /nyi zla'i phyag rgya zlum por bya/ /lha rnams so so'i bye brag las/ /swa sti ka la sogs pa'i rgya/ /mkhas pas ji skad bshad bzhin bri/ /yang na kun gyi zlum por bri/ /gang du lha rnams gzugs

dag tu/ /dgod pa bshad pa der yang ni/ /phyag rgya dag gam yang na ni/ /stan du dgod pa rnam par bshad/ /de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma smos kyang / /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bshad/ /de ltar phyag rgya dgod pa

'dis/ /dgod pa gnyis par bshad pa yin/ /stan du dgod pa'i cho ga ni/ /'di las gzhan pa gsum par bshad/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi nang du ni/ /tshon rtsi phye ma'i thig ler bri/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi tshad las ni/ /kho ra khor yug rgya cher bskor/ /rigs kyi bdag po'i lha

rnams ni/ /bzhin du de ltar bri/ /lha rnams gzhan ni gdan rnams kyi/ /spyi yi cho ga bshad pa yin/ /zlum po'am yang na gru bzhi rung / /thog ma stan ni dgod par bya/ /yid la de yi sngags zlos shing / /de yi steng du mkhas pas dgod/ /phyi rol du ni thig le la/ /

mkhas pas lha rnams ming gis dgod/ /thams cad thig ler gnas byas nas/ /spyan drang bar ni brtsam par bya/ /'di dag stan du dgod pa ste/ /gsum pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /yang na mi nus na/ /stan du dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor bya/ /yang na cho ga shes

pa yis/ /gsum po 'di yi cho ga ni/ /re re'am gnyis sam gsum char ram/ /bsres nas dkyil 'khor legs par bri/ /rigs kyi bdag po gsum rnams kyi/ /gsang sngags thog mar bkod nas su/ /dkyil 'khor nang du mkhas pa yis/ /lhag ma rnams kyi

phyag rgya bri/ /phyi rol du ni stan rnams bri/ /'di ni spyi yi cho ga ste/ /dkyil 'khor dag la khyad par du/ /bar ma rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /gzugs rnams legs par ma rdzogs na/ /nyes pa sngar ni bshad pa bzhin/ /gnas rnams stong par 'gyur bas na/ /cho ga tha ma mi shes

so/ /phyag rgya rnam gsum gang bkod pa/ /bar ma rab tu bsgrags pa yin/ /khyad par du ni de bsngags te/ /de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bri na bde ba ste/ /phyag rgya gang yin de nyid lha/ /de bas mkhas pas nan tan du/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi phyag rgya bri/ /

dkyil 'khor ma lus pa rnams su/ /ma bshad kyang ni dogs med pas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'og logs su/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo bri/ /dbus kyi stong pa gang yin pa/ /der yang bum pa'i steng du ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa gzhag /der yang mchod cing

bklag par bya/ /la la dag tu ma gsungs kyang / /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ /drung du blo dang ldan pa yis/ /gos dkar can ni rtag tu bri/ /phyag na rdo rje'i drung du ni/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor kun du bri/ /brtson 'grus chen mo mA ma kI/ /phyag rgya chen mo

bri bar bya/ /cho ga shes pas sgo drung du/ /dga' bo de dang bsnyen dga' bri/ /mkhas pas ji skad bshad pa yis/ /'phrog ma de bzhin mdun du bri/ /sgo rnams kun du rdo rje bri/ /phyogs skyong phyag rgya'ang lugs bzhin du/ /so so so sor drag po'i gzugs/ /

so so'i phyogs kyi gnas su bri/ /gnod sbyin nor bu bzang la sogs/ /bstan pa la ni gang dga' ba/ /sgo yi byang gi phyi rol gyi/ /phyi rol du yang de dgod do/ /gang dag tu yang ma bshad kyang / /shar du sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de bzhin chos dang dge 'dun la/ /gus

par dkyil 'khor byas nas mchod/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / /rgyal sras mthu chen thob pa dang / /nam mkha'i snying po don grub dang / /dri ma med pa'i blo gros dang / /de la sogs pa'i sems dpa' che/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol

dgod/ /bskal pa bzang po'i grogs po ni/ /byams pa la sogs thams cad dgod/ /rdo rje sde dang lag dang / /de bzhin bgegs kyi sde dpon dang / /dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas/ /tshangs pa chen po mes po bri/ /rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po yang / /

glang po che zhes bya ba dang / /yan lag bkram 'byin rtse bran can/ /g.yon phyogs cod pan mi bzad dang / /sna tshogs 'od dang legs par 'grub/ /rig sngags 'chang bdun bdag po ste/ /bdun po 'di dag rigs kyi gco/ /dngos grub pa ste mthu can rnams/ /dkyil

'khor dag ni thams cad kyi/ /lho yi phyogs su legs par dgod/ /ma mo rnams dang sna yon dang / /de bzhin gza' rnams sna tshogs dang / /sgra gcan stobs can rab sim dang / /rnam par snang byed la sogs dang / /nor rgyas la sogs klu rnams dang / /de dag nub kyi

phyogs su dgod/ /shar du rdo rje phyag rgya ni/ /brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang / /de bzhin gnas gtsang lha rnams kyang / /gus par yang ni mchod par bya/ /nyi zla gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dkar dang dmar ba'i bye brag gis/ /shar dang nub tu bris nas ni/ /de nas de gnyis

mkhas pas mchod/ /me yi phyogs su zhugs thab rgya/ /me lha drang srong 'khor bcas bri/ /lho phyogs be con phyag rgya ni/ /gshin rje la sogs bcas/ /bden bral phyogs su ral gri'i rgya/ /bden bral ba ni srin por bcas/ /chu lha'i phyogs su zhags pa'i rgya/ /

chu lha klu dang lhan cig tu/ /rlung gi phyogs su rgyal mtshan rgya/ /rlung gi lha ni rlung dang bcas/ /byang du dbyug to'i phyag rgya yang / /ku be ra yang gnod sbyin bcas/ /dbang ldan phyogs su rtse gsum rgya/ /dbang ldan tshogs dang lhan cig tu/ /'og tu bum pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /

sa yi lha mo lha min bcas/ /phyogs skyong rnams ni bzhin/ /de ltar gnas su dgod byas nas/ /byug spos me tog la sogs pas/ /mkhas pas so sor 'khor bcas mchod/ /mdzod spu dang ni mdung thung dang / /'khor los sgyur ba cher 'byung bcas/ /rig

sngags chen mo spyan dang ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / /mngag gzhug brtson 'grus chen po dang / /de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag gi/ /dkyil 'khor kun la dgod par bya/ /grags ldan ma dang dkar chen mo/ /de bzhin

gos dkar can dang ni/ /rta mgrin dang ni ral pa gcig /sgrol ma dkar sham dpal mo che/ /'dod pa 'byor byed gsang sngags dag /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus pa rnams su/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du dgod/ /rdo rje lcags kyu

khu tshur dang / /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag rgyar bcas/ /khro bo chen po thab sbyor dang / /gom pa dor ba nyid dang ni/ /rdo rje lug rgyud be con dang / /khro bo 'chol pa zhes bya dag /phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ma smos kyang ni de dag dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dang po'i nang du

ni/ /ji skad smos pa'i lha bkod nas/ /de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor ni/ /gnyis par rim pa ji bzhin du/ /ma smos pa dang 'dod pa yi/ /gsang sngags rnams kyang dgod bya zhing / /'khrul pa med par gsum pa yang / /bye brag tu ni dgod par bya/ /phyogs bzhir

chos klog bzhi bzhag nas/ /de la shar gyi phyogs su ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa bzhag /byang gi phyogs su bzhag pa ni/ /gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde yin/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhag pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo/ /theg pa chen po sdong pos

bshad/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhag nas su/ /gus par de dag mchod par bya/ /rgyud kun gyi ni gsang sngags bdag /yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /spyi yi cho ga gzhan 'di'ang bya/ /byang dang lho dang shar phyogs kyi/ /

phyogs gsum du ni stegs bu gsum/ /byas te rigs gsum bsams nas su/ /spyan drang ba yi cho ga bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi/ /gsang sngags kun la dbul lo zhes/ /me tog spos chus bkang ba yi/ /mchod yon dag ni

dbul bar bya/ /sangs rgyas pa la shar phyogs su/ /pad+ma 'dzin la byang phyogs su/ /gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad pa yi/ /gsang sngags rnams la lho phyogs su/ /de ltar byas na rigs gsum gyi/ /gsang sngags 'khor dang bcas pa kun/ /mchod pa byas

pa 'di ru ni/ /dgyes par gyur pa gdon mi za/ /cho ga 'di yis nub phyogs su/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams ni/ /kun la dbul lo zhes brjod cing / /phyi rol stegs bu steng du mchod/ /zhi ba dag gi cho ga la/ /byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog gsum/ /gtsang

ma'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/ /lha rnams kyang ni dgod par bya/ /rgyas pa la ni khyad par du/ /rig sngags gsang sngags thams cad dang / /bstan pa la ni dga' ba yi/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyang dgod par bya/ /drag shul spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /khro bo rnams kyi

phyag rgya ni/ /drag shul chen po'i rnam dag dang / /mngag gzhug pho mo mang po dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la'ang / /las rnams gsum du shes par bya/ /de bas cho ga 'di rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtags/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi

dbus dag na/ /sa stong gar yang ma gtogs pa/ /gang na yod pa de ru ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa bzhag /yang na sgo yi g.yas rol du/ /slob ma bzang po'i steng du bzhag /g.yon gyi phyogs su sbyin sreg phyir/ /me ni yam sreg shing gis sbar/ /yang na shar

lho mtshams dag tu/ /me ni rab tu sbar bar bya/ /yang na las kyi rjes mthun par/ /phyogs kyi bzhin du bzhag /dri gtsang khang ngam gnas khang ngam/ /phug gam yang na go skabs dag /dog pa bzhin du byed na ni/ /der ni ji ltar 'dod par bya/ /go skabs dog

pa dag tu ni/ /bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ma gtogs pa/ /slob dpon gyis ni gzhan mi bri/ /bris na mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni ma lus par/ /go skabs yangs pa'i phyogs su shis/ /khang dag gam khyams su yang / /goms pa

yis ni ci bder bri/ /rad rod dag gam sdong dum dag /ljon shing dag dang rdo ba ni/ /rab tu bsgrims nas dbyung bya ste/ /de dag zug rngu yin par bshad/ /mkhas pas de dbyung thabs med na/ /zhi ba'i cho ga byas te bzhag /snying po'i dkyil 'khor du ni de/ /bag med

nam yang mi bzhag go/ /rad rod la sogs bye brag dag /dkyil 'khor dbu ma ma gtogs par/ /gnas khang la sogs nyes med de/ /de dag de na rang bzhin gnas/ /khang dag la sogs par ni/ /bsang gtor byas pas dag par bshad/ /ri la sa gzhi

mnyam pa dang / /rdo pa'i zug rngu brtag mi dgos/ /gal te gnas kyi dbang gis su/ /lha rnams phyogs logs 'god byed na/ /mkhas pas zhi ba byas te gzhag /snying por nam yang mi bya'o/ /bya ba'i dbang gis de la sogs/ /'gal ba gang dang gang byed pa/ /de

dang der ni mkhas pa yis/ /thams cad zhi ba'i las kyis bsal/ /blo dang ldan pas cho ga 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bris nas ni/ /yid ni legs par mnyam bzhag nas/ /de yi 'og tu yang brtags te/ /brgya la 'ga' zhig ma legs na/ /de ni phyir yang

bcos par bya/ /mkhas pas rang gi gsang sngags sam/ /slob ma'i sngags kyang 'dod nad god/ /slob ma brtags pa la la zhig /gal te dbang ni bskur 'dod na/ /dbang bskur don du dkyil 'khor ni/ /phye ma dkar pos bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag dang

rjes mthun par/ /stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas su/ /de yi dbus su tshon sna lngas/ /pad+ma yongs su rdzogs par bri/ /bkra shis la sogs mtshan ma rnams/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa bri/ /bkra shis phyir ni gang bstan pa/ /yang na de ni dngos su dgod/ /mkhas

pas g.yos rnams gang bzhag pa'i/ /sa ris rnams kyang phye mas bcad/ /g.yos su byas pa'i rnam pa kun/ /bsogs nas der ni dgod par bya/ /bum pa dag dang rgyal mtshan dang / /rta babs bzhag pa'i sa ris dang / /phyi rol mdzes par

bya ba yang / /ji ltar 'dod pa phye mas bya/ /de nas gzhan yang lha rnams ni/ /spyan drang ba yi cho ga dang / /mchod pa ji bzhin du/ /yang dag mdor bsdus bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin bris nas/ /nye reg byas shing gtsang bar bar bya/ /lha rnams

la yang phyag byas nas/ /bzang ngam mi bzang brtag par bya/ /phyi rol shar phyogs kha bltas nas/ /yid la dkyil 'khor ba dag po yi/ /snying po'am gsang sngags kun zlos shing / /mtshan ma dag ni brtag par bya/ /ji srid ltas ni bzang po dag /'ga' zhig

'byung bar 'gyur gyi bar/ /de nyid bsgrims te yid gcig tu/ /bzlas brjod byed la 'bad cing bsdad/ /de mthong blo ldan rangs 'gyur bas/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags sam/ /bdag gis gang zhig bzlas pa yis/ /bsrung ba legs par sbyar bar

bya/ /yang na rgyud rnams kun gyi spyir/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa la/ /rdo rje be con brtson 'grus che/ /khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / /mgo la rdo rje smos pa yis/ /phur bu ra ba dra ba gsum/ /blo dang ldan pas lnga po dag /cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar

bya/ /bsrung ba rtsa ba'i gsang sngags sam/ /yang na de yi snying pos bya/ /slob ma rnams la yid kyis su/ /bsrung ba snga ma bzhin du bya/ /bsrung ba byas nas de 'og tu/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya/ /zhugs nas mchod yon snod thogs te/ /mchod

yon dag kyang dbul bar bya/ /mchod yon snod ni gser dngul lam/ /zangs sam shel lam nor bu 'am/ /mching bu dkar po las byas pa/ /shing ngam de bzhin rdo las byas/ /dung ngam lo ma skyongs bu 'am/ /nya phyis dag gam kham phor ni/ /sar pa yan

lag ma nyams pa/ /dag par byas la blang bar bya/ /der ni khro rgyal bzlas pa yi/ /me tog dag kyang bcug nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag ste dkyil 'khor gyi/ /gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du dri chu yi sa/ /mchod yon gus

par dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbu mar phul nas ni/ /lhag ma rnams la gtor bar ba shad/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsang gtor byas/ /de nas cho ga 'di bya'o/ /bum pa nag po ra ri med/ /gzugs bzang kha dog rab tu dmar/ /gsar la

ma chag ma gas pa/ /yang dag dbyibs ni legs shing zlum/ /bzlas brjod dag kyang lan bdun byas/ /spos chu dag gis bkang ba la/ /'bru rnams kun dang ldan byas shing / /sman rnams dang yang ldan pa dang / /rin chen kun dang rab tu ldan/ /mgul par

ras sar rangs pas dkris/ /me tog phreng ba sa rnam par brgyan/ /kha rgyan ldum bu bzang pos bya/ /shing tog bkra shis khar blugs pa/ /'bras bu me tog sil mar ldan/ /spos kyis byug cing bdug pas bdug /thams cad bkra shis dang ldan pa/ /bzlas

brjod lan bdun byas pa dag /bkra shis don du gnyer ba yin/ /phyogs dang mtshams rnams dag tu dgod/ /yon tan kun dang ldan pa yi/ /bum pa 'di kun ma 'byor na/ /dbang bskur phyir ni 'bring po gcig /nan tan bskyed de legs par gzhag /grwa dang

sgor ni ma lus par/ /bum pa dag kyang bzhag nas ni/ /bar sgo chen po gnyis gnyis shig /khyad par du ni gzhag par bya/ /bum pa gcig ni phyi sgo yi/ /drung du mngon par gzhag par bya/ /mang po 'byor par ma gyur na/ /brgyad dam yang na bzhi bzhag go/ /

nyung ngu rnams ni khyad par du/ /pha rol dag tu dgod bya ste/ /sgo yi drung du gcig bzhag pa/ /de ni nges par bya dgos so/ /'bras kyi sob mon sran gre'u/ /nas dang gro dang til dang lnga/ /'bru rnams kun zhes bya ba ni/ /las rnams kun la 'di dag gzung / /

sing g+h+ri byA g+h+ri kar Ni ka/ /ha sa ha sa de ba ste/ /sman rnams kun ces bya ba la/ /lnga po 'di dag shes par bya/ /byi ru gser gyi sa le sbram/ /dung dang mu tig nor bu ste/ /rin chen kun ces bya ba la/ /lnga po 'di dag shes par bya/ /rgyal mtshan

sar pa sna tshogs dang / /brgyad ni kho ra khor yug tu/ /yu ba drang po ring po la/ /dpyangs nas nye bar bzung byas te/ /dkar po shar gyi phyogs su gzugs/ /shar lho mtshams su le brgan gzugs/ /lho yi phyogs su nag po gzugs/ /lho nub mtshams su

dud kha gzugs/ /nub kyi phyogs su dmar po gzugs/ /nub byang mtshams su khra bo gzugs/ /byang gi phyogs su ser po gzugs/ /byang shar mtshams su ljang ser gzugs/ /de ltar rgyal mtshan brgyad po rnams/ /bzhin du gzugs par bya/ /rgyal mtshan

rnams kyi rtse mo la/ /tog ni rma bya'i mdongs kyis brgyan/ /rgyal mtshan rnams ni ma rnyed na/ /thams cad thal kar gcig pu'am/ /yang na de bas mang yang rung / /shar gyi phyogs su gzugs par bya/ /pog phor kham pa las byas pa/ /so ma btang ba dkar

po bcu/ /byas nas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ni/ /rgyab dang de bzhin mdun du dgod/ /pog phor dag tu ma 'byor na/ /kham pa'i phor bu'i nang nas dbul/ /de dag kyang ni ma 'byor na/ /gcig cig sgor ni bzhag nas dbul/ /me tog phreng bas brgyan pa

yi/ /rta babs dag kyang phyogs bzhir bya/ /nas dang gro dang 'bru rnams kyi/ /myu gu legs par bskyed pa dgod/ /dril bu gdugs dang rnga ma dang / /srad bu dag kyang phyogs bzhir ni/ /rta babs sogs las phyi rol tu/ /mdzes par bya phyir mkhas pas gdags/ /

'bras yos 'bru dang bcas pa yis/ /me tog sil ma rab tu dgram/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol tu/ /phye mas dkyil 'khor sdug gu bri/ /'jig rten 'di na grags pa yi/ /bkra shis la sogs gang yin rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol tu/ /phyogs

bzhi dag tu mkhas pas dgod/ /de ltar rgyas dang mdor bsdus la/ /ci nus su ni sbyar ba dag / cho ga bzhin du byas nas su/ /de nas spyan drang brtsam par bya/ /mchod yon cho ga snga ma bzhin/ /ma yengs par ni sbyar nas su/ /so so sngags kyis ci rigs par/ /

mkhas pas spyan ni drang bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gsang sngags sam/ /yang na thams cad snying pos bya/ /sngags rgyud las ni ci bshad pa/ /de bzhin du ni spyan drang ba'o/ /mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs rigs la/ /'khor los sgyur bas spyan

drang ngo / /yang na spyan drang cho ga ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis byar yang rung / /phyag na pad+mo'i rigs kun la/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos spyan drang bya/ /yang na spyan drang cho ga la/ /dpal mos las kun byed pas bya/ /mkhas pas rdo rje 'dzin rigs la/ /gnod mdzes

zhes bya'i gsang sngags sam/ /ma yengs par ni mA ma kIs/ /spyan drang ba yi cho ga bya/ /sngags rgyud bdag po'i sngags gang yin/ /de 'am de yi snying po yis/ /lha rnams kyi ni ming smos te/ /mkhas pas spyan drang cho ga bya/ /yang na rang gi rigs kyi sngags/ /

gang yin de 'am de snying ngam/ /cho ga ji skad gsungs pas kyang / /spyan drang ba ni mkhas pas bya/ /yang na cho ga ci gsungs pas/ /yang na phyi 'am nang dag gi/ /rang gi gsang sngags gang yin pa/ /de dag gis ni spyan drang ba'am/ /ji ltar lobs par byar yang rung / /

mchod yon gyi ni cho ga bzhin/ /de ltar spyan drang byas nas ni/ /mchod yon nyid kyis lan re zhing / /de nas zhabs bkru'i cho ga bya/ /bde bar gshegs zhes bya la sogs/ /phyag kyang gus par 'tshal ba dag /bzhin du byas nas ni/ /mkhas pas de dag mchod

pa brtsam/ /dang po byug spos dbul byas te/ /de yi 'og tu me tog dbul/ /de nas legs par mnyam bzhag nas/ /bdug spos lha bshos dag kyang dbul/ /tsan+dan a kar gur gum dang / /ut+pal rgya spos pri yang ku/ /li shi shing tsha spang spos smrig /nA ga

puSh+pa gA nAm bu/ /gran te sug smel pa tra dang / /la ni s+tho'u ner sar ldan/ /rdo dreg sha ta puSh+pa dang / /sna ma'i lo ma tsa rong dang / /ko 'un tim 'du ri ka dang / /ng+h+yan n+ya ka tso la sogs bzang / /'bras bu thang chu'i tshogs rnams ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis

'di sbyar nas/ /mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa yis/ /phyi dang nang gi lha kun la/ /bzhin du gsang sngags kyis/ /mngon par bsngags nas byug spos 'bul/ /srog chags yan lag sbyar mi rung / /rgya skyegs chang sogs sbyar mi rung / /rdzas ngan dag dang
