cig /bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mi mnyes par byed par ma byed cig /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pad+me pad+me ni/ pad+ma lo tsa ne/ pad+ma sa~M b+ha be swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

tad+ya thA/ a mi ta/ ud b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+ti/ ga ga na kirti ka re/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma kle shak+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'phags pa byams pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu bdag mngon du lung ston pas lung ston cing mngon sum

du lung ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i lung ston pa dang / lkog ma yin par lung ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du lung ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i mthar lung ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings su lung ston pa nas de kho na nyid mthong ba'i bar lung ston pas lung ston par gyur cig /

lung bstan nas bcom ldan 'das de dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig /na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyun pa'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad rnams dang / de las gzhan

pa de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi zag pa med pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas de'i drung du bus pa'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob cing / gzhon nu'i rab tu 'byung ba dang / lkog ma yin par rab tu 'byung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du rab tu 'byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthar rab

tu 'byung ba nas de kho na nyid mthong ba'i bar du rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig /de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i khyad par du 'phags pa/ skyon med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ lha dang mi dag mngon par dga' ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpas bsngags pa/ sems can la sman pa'i slad du bdag rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig /de nas bskal pa bzang po'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la byis pa nas/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /

gzims cha dang / bsnyun pa'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad rnams kyis mnyes par bgyis nas de dag gi drung du bus pa'i rab tu 'byung ba thob cing / gzhon nu'i rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon sum du rab tu 'byung ba dang / lkog ma yin par rab tu 'byung po dang / de bzhin nyid

du rab tu 'byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthar rab tu 'byung ba nas de bzhin nyid mthong ba'i bar du rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig /de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i khyad par du 'phags pa/ skyon med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ lha dang mi dag

mngon par dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bsngags pa/ sems can la sman pa'i slad du bdag rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig /de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang lags pa de dag bdag gis mnyes par bgyid par gyur cig /de dag gi drung du skad cig ma gcig la ming dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing lung bstan pa thob cing bus pa'i rab tu 'byung ba dang / gzhon nu'i rab tu 'byung ba dang /

mngon sum du rab tu 'byung ba dang / lkog ma yin par rab tu 'byung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du rab tu 'byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthar rab tu 'byung ba nas de kho na nyid mthong ba'i bar du rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i

khyad par du 'phags pa/ skyon med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ lha dang mi dag mngon par dga' ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bsngags pa/ sems can la sman pa'i slad du bdag rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta d+ya thA/ ma tri ma tri/ ma tri/ sa ma tsit+te swA hA/ de nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson par gyur cig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang / stong

nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / lag na rin po che dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dbang thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / nams kyang dbang po zhan cing dbang po

dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lta ba ngan par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / nams kyang yul 'khor ngan pa dang / skye bo ngan pa'i nang du skye bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang mi khom par skye bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos

dang / dge 'dun mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang tshul khrims 'chal bar mi 'gyur ba nas rmi lam du yang nyan thos dang / rang byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir nams kyang byang chub kyi sems dang

bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang skad cig tu yang thabs dang shes rab dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang

rigs dman pa dang brtson 'grus zhan pa dang / le lo can du ma gyur cig /bdag tshe rabs nas tshe rabs su sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus sbyangs pa skye bar gyur cig /sems can la sman pa'i slad du bdag rdzus te skye bar gyur cig /ji ltar sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khrungs pa de ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar gyur cig /de nas bstan bcos thams cad dang / bzo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /

byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta d+ya thA/ kirti te/ sarba dzi ne b+hiH/ a ti kirti ta/ sarba dzi ne b+hiH/ badzra A ka re/ badzra saM b+ha be/

badzra b+he da ka re swA hA/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkhas nye bar 'tsho ba ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phung po lnga po gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas/ sangs

rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yongs su spyod pa dag la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /nam gum nas kyang bya rgod dang / spyang ki dang / khyi dang / wa dang / gcan gzan dang / bya rnams kyis pags pa dang / sha dang / rgyus pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / khrag rnams

yongs su za bar gyur cig /de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig /de nas khams gsum na rdul phra mo ji snyed pa'i sems can de snyed sems kyi skad cig la rnam par thar bar bgyid par gyur cig /rnam par

thar bar bgyis nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dag la rab tu 'god par gyur cig /de nas mthong bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig /thos pa dang / dran pas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig /byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gar+b+he gar+b+he/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa gang lags pa de

dag la bdag gi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas rus pa'i khong nas dga' ba dang / rkang gi khong nas dga' bas sems thams cad dang / lus thams cad btud nas sems can la sman pa'i slad du sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon

mongs pa'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ji tsam bde tsam du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing bzhugs par gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga na A ka re/ ga ga na saM b+ha be/ ga ga na

kI rti ka re swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshogs shin tu bsags pa gang lags pa rnams dang / /tshogs chung ngu gang lags pa rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang lags pa rnams dang / /byang chub

tu sems ma bskyed pa gang lags pa de rnams la bdag bskul ma 'debs te/ de rnams la bdag gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa de dbul bar bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshogs rnams shin tu bsags shing dge ba'i

rtsa ba rnams legs par bsags nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur cig /bdud bzhi tshar gcod par gyur cig /sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur

cig /sems can la sman pa'i slad du sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de tsam du bzhugs par gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa blo gros

mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a k+Sha ye a k+Sha ye/ ak+Sha ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rdul phra mo snyed kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams

kyi smon lam chen po bcu po khri phrag grangs med pa gang lags pa de dag mdzad pa rnams la lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa de bzhin du bdag tshe rabs tshe rabs su 'jug par gyur cig /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de'i 'jig rten

gyi khams pad+ma can dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams mig mi 'dzums dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs de'i 'jig rten gyi khams dri bsung zhim pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bkod pa dang / ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sbyin pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs

rgyas kyi zhing legs par bstan pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang brgyan gyi gleng gzhir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po byung ba mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der

byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi mthus rab tu 'byung zhing / der de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig /ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis smon lam chen po shin tu yongs su dag pas bsgrubs pa/ rang gi bsod nams las nges par skyes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan pa de dag yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa

dang / yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'gyur zhing chu zheng dpag tu med pa dang / yon tan gyi rgyan dpag tu med pa'i ming dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khyad par du 'phags pa mngon par mtho ba'i rgyan bkod

par mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / thos pa dang / dran pas lhan cig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs

su btang ba/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes mi snyegs pa/ ngang tshul ngan pa/ sdig pa'i chos yang dag par spyod pa/ rgyud bsregs pa/ bsam pa bsregs pa/

sa bon bsregs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa/ ngan song la mngon par phyogs pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gtum po dam pa'i chos spong ba de rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dus pa dang por 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gis

de dag thams cad zhi ba'i lam bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la 'god par gyur cig /de nas ji tsam du khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can de rnams zhing der 'dus pa gnyis pa las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bdag gis de dag thams cad bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba'i

nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'god par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa dung gi 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sha~M khe/ sha~M khe/ shang kha pAN+Da re swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dus pa'i yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad bdag gcig bu gnyis su ma mchis pas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'phel bar bgyi

bar spro bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad cing / de las gzhan pa byang chub kye phyogs kyi chos rnams

kyang mngon du mdzad nas/ bde bar bzhugs pa tshegs chung ngus bzhugs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rtse mo'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shi khe/ shi kha ban+d+he swA hA/ de'i 'og tu bdag tshogs shin tu bsags/ gnag pa yongs su

rdzogs/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bgyi ba de

bzhin nyid kyi 'khor lo dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'khor lo dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byung

ba'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byed pa'i 'khor lo dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i 'khor lo dang / bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba'i

nyon mongs pa thams cad spang pa'i 'khor lo dang / nga dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / chad pa dang / bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon

par zhen pa'i bar mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / mdor na gang na 'khor lo med pa/ bskor ba med pa de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur cig /rab tu bskor nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig /yongs su smin par

bgyis nas sems can la sman pa'i slad du sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de tsam du gnas par gyur cig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ma n+ye/ ma n+ye/

sar+b+ba ma n+ya pra hA Ne swA hA/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongs su sbyong ba dang / de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / pha ma dang / bla ma dang / yon gnas dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dman pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa las bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i

rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / mthol ba dang / bshags pa dang ldan pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang ldan pa dang / byis pa nas bzung nas da ltar ram/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis

pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu bsags pa nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar gang lags pa de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas/ mchog dang / gtso bo dang / gya nom pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / bla

na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis

pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / lus dang sems grol ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar

bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad nas yongs su bsngos pa dang / yongs su bsdo ba dang / yongs su bsdo

bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar chos nyid de dang / ji ltar de bzhin nyid de dang / ji ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' de dang / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings de dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid de dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga nas ji

ltar de kho na nyid mthong ba'i bar gang la gnyis med cing gnyis ma yin pa med pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha bi Sha ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ 'phags pa yongs su bsngo

ba'i rgyal po sngags dang bcas pa ji snyed pa rdzogs // //paN+Di ta bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ye shes snying po dang / dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang / /ngan 'gro rnams las bsgral ba dang / /nyon mongs rnams las sgrol ba'i phyir/ /srid pa mi bde dogs pa na/ /sdug bsngal sna

tshogs ci mchis pa/ /de ltas yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do/ /sems can phongs pa thams cad kyi/ /skyabs su bdag nyid rtag tu shog /bdag ni mgon med rnams kyi mgon/ /rten med rnams kyi rten du bdag /

skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal bde bar byed pa dang / /bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs zhi bar byed par shog /dge ba'i las rnams gang dang gang / /'di dang gzhan du bsags pa rnams/ /bsod nams

ye shes zhes bya ba'i/ /tshogs ni rnam pa gnyis su shog /pha rol phyin pa drug sgo nas/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus gang brtsams pa/ /de yang sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad la ni phan par shog /tshe yi mtha' klas byed pa dang / /gang yang

cung zad byed 'gyur ba/ mdor na sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi ba dang / /grol bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing / /byang chub rab tu dga' brtson no/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /cho ga bzhin du kun du bskyed/ /

sems can kun la snying rje dang / /byams pa nye bar gnas par bya/ /sems ni legs par sbyang ba'i phyir/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis rjes dran drug /nang gi bdag nyid zhi ba yis/ /bsam pa gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /

smon lam ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ /bdag kyang dge ba'i sems kyis su/ /de bzhin du ni smon lam 'debs/ /chos kyi longs spyod sna tshogs la/ /mnyam par bzhag nas yi rang ngo / /sems can thams cad bde ba dang / /zhi zhing nad kyang med par shog /

bdag ni bya ba kun nus shing / /yon tan dang yang ldan par shog /nor ldan gtong phod shes rab can/ /bzod ldan dge la dang po dang / /sems can tshe rabs thams cad du/ /skye ba dran zhing brtser ldan shog /dpal legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen
po las byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs // @#//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun

chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang

gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag

dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags

pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig /btsun pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta

zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas

bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags

pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang ma mchis par

bgyid par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol

tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par gyur cig /bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho bdag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa

chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems tshad med par brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig /tshe

rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing / ji skad bstan

pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis

sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa

dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams

cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis bas/ thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi chad par

'byung bar gyur cig /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par/ /de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing / /de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par/ /de srid

mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing / /ngag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na/ /de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba/ /de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing / /yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig /de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /thugs rje'i

dbang phyug rten bgyis pas/ /lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing / yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/ /rtag tu sbyor bar bgyis pas na/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras

gzigs/ /srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po/ /yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te/ /srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/

ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M tsakra brti/ tsin+tA ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha/ dz+wa la A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs // //o~M pad+me tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la hU~M/ snying po'o/ /o~M b+ha ra ta pad+me hU~M/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M ma Ni

badzre Ni hU~M/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sngags snying bzhi 'byung ba dang / smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa rdzogs // @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di'am

gang dag 'das pa dang / /mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /zad pa chags bral bdud

rtsi 'dus ma byas/ /shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye/ /bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin

rab bstan pa/ /ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa/ /rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba/ /ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang zag chen po brgyad po rab

bsngags shing / /gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni/ /drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/ /bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gsungs/ /de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te/ /zhing rab gshin la sa bon btab pa bzhin/ /'di ni dge

'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing / /gau tam yi bstan la 'jug byed pa/ /de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste/ /mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa/ /de

bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni/ /'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang / /the tshom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag /cig char spangs te 'phags pa'i bden

mthong ba/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang / /sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing / /glo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed la/ /de ltar de dag

lta bas 'dzin mi byed/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ci ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa/ /phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi/ /

gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi/ /'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing / /lus kyang sbyin par

yid la byas pa ni/ /de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ci ltar me ni rlung gis ra ba gtor ba/ /lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid/ /de ltar kun du sbyor bar

ba btang ba/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro/ /des ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /ston mchog lha dang mis

ni mchod 'os pa/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /sems

can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad

deng 'dir bder gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog /'di na rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis/ /shin tu bden

pa gsung zhing med pa/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang / /rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang / /dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang / /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /

sha ri'i bu yi shes rab dang / /maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang / /ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/ /'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / /kauN+Di n+ya'i sngar thob dang / /kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang / /tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang / /brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang / /

'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang / /sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang / /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang / /de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis/ /bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa

las gsungs pa'i smon lam rdzogs // @#/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung / /thams cad skyob pa

sA la'i drung na gnas/ /bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i drung / /sangs rgyas gser thub u dum bA ra'i drung / /'od srung n+ya gro d+ha yi drung na gnas/ /shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/ /phyin nas byang chub thob gyur gau ta ma/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de

dag la/ /mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag /lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas/ /rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis khyed rnams bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde

legs shog /lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun du bde legs shog /de dag sdig par ma gyur cig /nyi ma thams cad

dge ba yin/ /rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med/ /den pa'i tshig gis kun du bde legs shog /rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang
bden tshig rdzogs // @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zas skom bzang po ro zhim zhing mdog sdug la dri bsung dang ldan zhing ngad ldang ba/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dpag

bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i nags tshal dkon zhing dri ma med la rgyan gyis bklubs pa/ yal ga'i thor to'i ljid kyis g.yur za la mgo lcogs me tog kha phye zhing 'dab mas legs par brgyan te/ bung ba lang long khyus lding zhing 'phungs pa rnams kyis bzhib cing non pa'i

shugs kyis bag tsam 'dar ldem ldem la/ rin chen yal ga dang ma rgad lcug phran gyi bla re 'jol ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ 'gro ba dag tu ma tshor par yang 'gro ba'i g.yang sa chen po yang bdag tu mar me snang gsal dag cing dri ma med pa lda bu byin pa

gang las bsod nams dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba dang / dge ba'i rgyu dang mthun pa bde dgu'i gzhir gyur pa des na sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba che ge mo zhig gi lus dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis bsgrubs pa la tshe dang / kha

dog dang / stobs dang / gzi byin dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / shes rab dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /sbyin bdag gi bsod nams ma skyes pa rnams ni skye bar gyur cig /sbyin bdag gi longs spyod skyes zin pa rnams ni

'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi pha ma mchog tu dka' ba byed byed pa/ gso gso/ gnam gnam/ bskyed bskyed/ bsring bsring la 'dzam bu'i gling bkra yer yer mig gis mthong bar byed pas kyang bsod nams kyi phud kyi skal shas thob

par gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi chung ma rnams dang / bu rnams dang / bu mo rnams dang / sbyin bdag gi gnyen 'dab mdza' bshes rgyas ba'i tshan ris gang dag 'khod cing 'tshol gnas pa de dag kyang tshe ring zhing / longs spyod che la g.yog 'khor

mang bar gyur cig /gang dag 'das shing tshe 'phos pa de dag kyang 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i gnas dang gnas tha dad pa'i khyad par thob par gyur te/ lha'i gnas su skyes par gyur nas/ 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal snga nas mnyes par byed par gyur cig /de

bzhin du rgyal po'i mchog rgyal po chen po mnga' bdag dam pa dpal lha btsan pos ma phebs pa rnams ni phebs par gyur cig /phebs zin pa rnams ni cham du phebs par gyur cig /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang brnyes par gyur cig /de bzhin

du nye 'khor gyi grong na gnas pa'i rigs bzhi ste/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa yul gyi mi rnams la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur cig /de bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya

byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bde ba'i ri bo dang / gangs can dang / lngas rtsen dang / lnga len la sogs pa dang / nor bu

bzang dang / rdzogs bzang gnyis dang / 'brog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am

ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sbyin bdag gi khyim 'di na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang / sbyin bdag gis bsten pa'i lha'i khyad par gyis de dag gzi byin dang / stobs dang gzhal med khang rnams rgyas par gyur cig /de dag gzi byin dang ldan par gyur/ stobs

dang ldan par gyur/ gzhan gyis mi tshugs par gyur/ che bar grags par gyur nas/ sbyin bdag bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid kyi mdzod dang / bang ba dang / ba lang gi khyu dang / phyugs gdags sna tshogs kyi khyu dang / zhing gi rmo brko dang / las kyi sgo

rnams dang / bla 'og gi bya ba thams cad la chos bzhin du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par gyur cig /gnod pa rnams ni zlog par gyur cig /don du bsgrubs pa rnams ni snang bar gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi dad pa dang sbyar te/

dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi gnod pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba rnams zlog par gyur cig /kyi bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi skyin pa'i rabs las 'byung ba'i smyon lam bar gyur cig /mi rnams tshol khros g.yen

spyo ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /mdor na khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad dang /

srog chags thams cad kyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa ma skyes ma byung ba/ ma byas ma bcos pa/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ mi gnas pa/ dmigs su med pa/ bde ba/ zhi ba/ gya nom pa/ bde legs can/ gnas dang / gling dang / skyob pa dang / skyabs

dang / dpung gnyen dang / mi g.yo ba gang yin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi mchog de reg cing thob par gyur cig /gnod sbyin gang dag bzhon pa mi zad dpung can lha rdzas gos gyon phreng ba thogs/ gang dag 'jig rten gsum

mchod mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sangs rgyas skyabs song ba/ lngas rtsen lag na rdo rje nor sbyin dpal can nor bu bzang sras la sogs pa/ de dag thams cad lhan cig rtag tu khyod kyi khyim du chos bzhin srung bar shog /lngas rtsen dang ni 'phrog ma

bu sdug 'khor bcas nor bu bzang sras dpung dang bcas rnams dang / gnod sbyin dbang po lag na rdo rje rang gi sde tshan bcas dang rang gi sder bcas dang / /gzhan yang gnod sbyin dbang po gang dag sde chen grags ldan bstan pa dag la dga' ba rnams/ /thams cad

mthun par khyod kyi pha tshan dang ni gnyen sdug bcas la rtag tu skyong gyur cig /mtshan mo dang ni nyi ma 'char ka nyi ma'i gung rnams dang / /nyi ma nub kar rtag tu khyod la bkra shis ldan par shog /dpal chen lag na rdo rje nor bu bzang dang 'phags skyes sogs/ /khyod

dang gnyen 'dun rnams dang bcas la yongs su skyong gyur cig /gtong la dpa' ba rnams kyang khyim 'khor stobs dang 'byor pa grub cing mi nad med par shog /yon gnas rnams kyang yon tan tshogs pas 'phel bar 'gyur zhing 'bru rnams rab tu rgyas par shog /mchod

rten rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur cing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yun ring 'bar bar shog /rgyal po chos bzhin byed pas skyong gyur sems can mtha' dag dga' bzhir bde bar myong gyur cig /sbyin pa'i rabs las 'byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs // //

@#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la ser sna rnams chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud

mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams

pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs

mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don

grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig

gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad

par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin bcas lha bde legs dang / /

'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang

bzhi khyed cag bde legs gyur/ /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir ldog dag kyang bde gyur cig /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun du bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig

par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden

tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang

rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'phags pa yangs pa'i
grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ swasti gA thA/ bod skad du/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /lha cig nye bar song nas su/ /lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te/ /sangs rgyas chen po thub pa che/ /ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur/ /des ni tshig 'di gsan gyur nas/ /'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu rjod byed pa/ /nga yi bde legs

'gyur te nyon/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris na/ /rin chen rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa/ /des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la/ /cis kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char mi phod/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin

chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gya nom gang / /shAkya thub pas mnyam bde bzhag thugs chud pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te/ /de sngon byas na phyin

chad mya ngan med/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa/ /de dag

rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste/ /sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin tu dkon/ /de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /

bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gya nom pa/ /'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /shes rab dam pa mchog gi dam pa mchog /mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin tu

rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang / /mtha' yas blo ldan de bzhin gshegs

gsungs pa/ /ting 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa/ /ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni

shin tu bde legs shog /ji ltar sgo gtan dam zhing ra ba dam ste/ /stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa/ /de ltar mkhas pa bden bzhi mthong gnas pa/ /'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yo/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun

rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams kun dang

ldan/ /kun gyi dam pa 'jigs pa kun dang bral/ /bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis

ni shin tu bde legs shog /srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yo 'gyur ba med/ /skyon med 'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /shin tu 'gog cing gya nom des par 'byung / /shin tu dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phrogs/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos

kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i/ /bden rnams mthong ste gang dag bag yod pa/ /bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral

pa/ /de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /dam pa rnams kyis dam pa don

dam mkhyen/ /mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam brtson/ /gzhan gyis mi phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs/ /shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten

mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /'dun pa bskyed nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing / /gau tam bstan la rtag brtson rab grol zhi/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dag zhi der reg /'di la de reg grangs

su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /bden pa mthong bas brjed pas brgya lam na/ /gal

te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang / /de ni de 'chal pa yi 'os min te/ /chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden

pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na/ /sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa'am mtshungs pa med/ /lha dang mi yi ston pa bla na med/ /ston pa ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med

de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /so ga'i zla ba dang por thub pa yis/ /nags khrod chos kyi dam pa rab brnyes pa/ /chos de dang ni lhag pa'am

mtshungs pa med/ /'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /sdig pa rnying zad

gsar du byas med la/ /rims nad med pas 'jigs med mya ngan bral/ /rtsa ba 'gags pas sred pa mi skyed pa/ /bstan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji
ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ /bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ swas+t+ya ya na gA thA/ bod skad du/ bde

legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni/ /lha zhig nye bar song nas su/ /gang gis rtag tu bde legs pa/ /bdag gis zhu yis bcom ldan gsungs/ /dam

pas de dag gsan pa dang / /'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pa/ /gang gis kun du bde legs su/ /'gyur ba lha khyod legs par nyon/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /dad pa mi g.yo legs rab brtan/ /gang zhig dge ba tshul

khrims can/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig pha dang ma dag dang / /bu dang bu mo bran dag la/ /rtag tu legs par bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig dgra bcom grags pa la/ /legs par rab dad

yon 'bul dang / /lha yi bka' bzhin byed pa dag /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med pa dang / /gang zhig rnam gsum rab bsdams pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'byung po

thams cad la/ /tshad med kun du mi 'khrugs pa/ /byams pa'i sems ni sgom byed pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spang phyir/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /bde ba 'dren pa legs bsgom pa/ /de dag kun du bde

legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyi/ /stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing / /de ni sems la gnas gyur pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis lus kyi dri med chos/ /mngon sum byas nas rgyu ba dang / /dgra bcom rnam grol sems

ldan pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /gti mug rnams dang chags bral zhing / /ye shes 'khrug med skyes gyur pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /mgon po yang srid
spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ de ba pa ri pr-its+tshA maM ga la gA thA/

bod skad du lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon po phyogs gcig bzhugs pa na/ lha gcig dpa' bo chen po la/ /phyag 'tshal 'di skad chig

gsol to/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lag lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /

bkra shis rnams ni rjod byed pa/ /de dag bkra shis brjod par bya/ /yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang / /sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang / /sems ni legs par gtad byas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yan/ /sbyin dang shin tu snyan smra dang / /

yang dag don la rnam nges dang / /khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /byis pa rnams la mi sten dang / /mkhas pa rnams la sten pa dang / /mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /pha

ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang / /'byung po kun la snying brtse ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang / /dge ba'i las la sten pa dang / /bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa/ /de ni bkra shis

dam pa yin/ /nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang / /chog shes mthun pas 'tsho ba dang / /rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sbyin spyod de bzhin bzod pa dang / /'phags pa rnams dang mthun sbyor dang / /dus skabs su ni

chos nyan pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /le lo med dang mang thos dang / /chos la legs par rnam nges dang / /de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig sems can thams cad la/ /byams

pa'i sems ni ra ba bsgom zhing / /dpag tu med de mi 'khrugs pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs dang / /tshul khrims nongs par ma gyur pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam

pa yin/ /'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang / /mya ngan 'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang / /shes pa mi

'khrugs skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang / /gang gi sems ni mi g.yo dang / /dri med zhi dang mya ngan med/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /de dang 'di ni ci rigs par/ /'di la bkra shis de
dag ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig stod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur/ /lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs // @#/ /dkon chog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal

rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi bskyod pa/ /

rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /rigs lnga bde gshegs rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje sems ma dang ni rin chen sems ma dang / /chos kyi sems ma dang ni

las kyi sems mar bcas/ /bcom ldan yum mchog rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje sems dpa' dang ni rdo rje rgyal po dang / /rdo rje chags pa dang ni rdo rje legs par bcas/ /bcom

ldan mi bskyod 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje rin chen dang ni rdo rje gzi brjid dang / /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang ni rdo rje bzhad par bcas/ /bcom ldan rin 'byung 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod

pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje chos rab dang ni rdo rje rnon po dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje smra bar bcas/ /bcom ldan snang mtha'i 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra

shis shog /rdo rje las rab dang rdo rje rdo rje srung ba dang / /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang ni rdo rje khu tshur bcas/ /bcom ldan don grub 'khor gyi 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /lha mo sgeg mo dang ni lha mo phreng ba ma/ /

lha mo glu ma dang ni lha mo gar mar bcas/ /nang gi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /lha mo bdug spos ma dang lha mo me tog ma/ /lha mo mar me ma dang lha mo dra mar bcas/ /phyi yi

mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /sgo ba lcags kyu ma dang sgo ba zhags pa dang / /sgo ba lcags sgrog ma dang sgo ba dril bur bcas/ /bcom ldan sgo srung rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod

pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs // //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can/ /tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis

phun sum tshogs gyur cig /bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rig rdzu 'phrul can/ /tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du/ /shing mchog sun d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur

cig /rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can/ /tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du/ shing mchog sA la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni

stobs ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /

tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ /u dum bA ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can/ /tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na bA rA Na sI ru/ /n+ya gro

d+ha yi shing drung gon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can/ /tshe lo brgya ba'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du/ /a shwat+tha yi shing drung mngon par sangs

rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang / /phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin brlabs rmad byung ba/ /chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur
ba/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa ta thA ga ta maM ga la gA thA/ bod

skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan/ /zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa/ /dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs

pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa/ /dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis

gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing / /yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi slu ba/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis

des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing / /tshe grangs med par byin gyis 'ob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu

rnams la zhi byed shog /sems can don gyi las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing / /'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa/ /thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs
pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs // @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ bcom ldan gser mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon 'jam dpal

gzhon nu'i sku/ /bde gshegs sku yi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni 'dir bde legs shog /bcom ldan dung mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /bde gshegs gsung

gi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /bcom ldan ljang ser ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon phyag na rdo rje ste/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
dpal rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ra t+na tri mang+ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

rgya mtsho lta bur rgal dka' 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgyal/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis bsag dka' ma lus rdzogs/ /'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig gyur pa de bzhin gshegs/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /rang don spangs

shing gzhan don rtag tu lhur len cing / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lta ba rgyang bsrings te/ /dad dang brtson 'grus lhur len grogs mchog byang chub sems/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /skye 'gag med cing rtog pa'i 'ching byed

mtha' dag spangs/ /ma rig mun pa 'joms byed stong nyid sgron me'i mchog /dmigs pa sna tshogs spangs pa lam gyi bde sgrub chos/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa
rdzogs // @#/ /rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su sku mdog gser 'dra ba/ /shes rab rtags su ral gri po ti phyag na bsnams/ /'phags pa 'jam

dpal gzhon nu'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i 'od chags pa/ /skyon gyis ma gos phyag mtshan phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bkra

shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags su sku mdog mthing nag sngo/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis

dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ maM ga la gA thA/ /bod skad du/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed dang po'o/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab

mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/ /dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang lha dang lha ma

yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba bo/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa/ /

tshogs kyi lam dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i/ /gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /dbang bcas lha yis bskor ba'i bkra

shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum bI'i tshal/ /lha mang dag gis bsten par mgon po bltam pa na/ /srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni

skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /lhums nas bltam pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras/ /byur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer

dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/ /rmad du grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa/ /bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste/ /

dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs/ /lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing / /baiDUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtswa bting steng

bzhugs te/ /skyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /chu bo'i 'gram na tsa sha'i phreng gis yongs bskong ba/ /shin tu rmad du byung ba'i srid pa sel mdzad pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra

shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs/ /mang po btul te sa steng dang ni nam mkha' la/ /bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu

rnams la zhi byed shog /sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te/ /nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dgra rnam btul ba/ /ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer bA rA na sIr

drang srong mchog bzhugs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bstan pa yi bkra shis gang / /lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa/ /bsod nams bya

byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang / /'gro la bde ba bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag /nye bar

ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs/ /sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /

bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa/ /man dA ra ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/ /lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi

byed shog /lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa/ /mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dkon mchog gsum dang
mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#// rgya gar skad du/ rat+na tri swa sti gA thA/ /bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /che ba'i che mchog ston mchog bla na med/ /chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /
bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med/ /
dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnam 'phel ba/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /dge 'dun yon
tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba/ /rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra
shis shog /tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i byin brlabs kyis/ /phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te/ /bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang / /tshe
ring nad med bde skyid ldan par shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa rdzogs // //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
